Noda time atta dat, two man wa beena waak wid Jedus beena gwine ta one willage. Wiles dey da waak, Jedus come ta um, bot e look diffunt.
De two man gone back ta Jerusalem an tell de oda res wa done happen. Bot dey ain bleebe dem man needa.
Atta dat, Jedus come ta de leben ciple wen dey beena nyam. E buke um cause dey ain been bleebe dat e da lib, an cause dey been too haad head fa bleebe dem people wa done been shim atta e done git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin.
Jedus tell um say, “Oona mus go all oba de wol an tell all de people de Good Nyews bout me.
De poson wa bleebe de Good Nyews an git bactize, God gwine sabe dat poson. Bot de one wa ain bleebe de Good Nyews, God gwine jedge um.
Dem people wa bleebe de Good Nyews, God gwine gim powa fa do dem miracle yah. Een me name dey gwine dribe ebil sperit outta people, dey gwine taak een nyew tongue.
Ef dey pick op snake or ef dey drink pison, nottin ain gwine hut um. Dey gwine pit dey han pon sick people an pray fa dem fa be well, an dem people gwine git well.”
Wen de Lawd Jedus done taak ta e ciple dem, God tek Jedus op eenta heaben. Jedus gone seddown ta God right han fa rule wid um.
De ciple dem gone all oba, da tell people de Good Nyews. An de Lawd Jedus hep um, gim powa fa do miracle so dat de people know dat wa de ciple dem say, e true fa sho.]
Deah Theophilus, plenty people beena try fa write down all de ting dem wa we bleebe fa true, wa done happen mongst we.
An all wa dey done write down, dis de same ting wa de people dem dat been wid Jedus wen e fus staat, dey done tell we. An dey beena preach God wod.
So, Honorable Theophilus, A figga since A done beena study bout dem ting good fashion fom de time dey fus staat, A oughta write um down fa ya step by step fom staat ta finish.
A da write fa mek ya know all de trute consaanin dem ting wa dey done laan ya, fa leh ya know dat all dis wa dey laan ya bout done happen fa true.
Same time wen Herod been king ob Judea, one Jew priest name Zechariah been dey. E been one ob de priest dem ob Abijah group. An e wife name been Lizzybet. Lizzybet blongst ta de fambly ob de head Priest Aaron too.
Zechariah an Lizzybet beena waak scraight wid God. Dey beena keep all de Law ob de Lawd an do ebryting e tell um fa do.
Bot dey ain hab no chullun cause Lizzybet ain been able. An now dey bof been ole.
One time wen Abijah group beena wok een God House, Zechariah beena do e wok dey, da cyaa out de priest judy.
Now den, wen de priest dem wahn fa pick one ob um fa go eenside God House fa bun incense, dey write all de priest dem name down, fole de paper an pick one. Dis time yah Zechariah name come out fa bun de incense. So e gone eenside de Lawd house fa do e wok.
Same time de incense beena bun eenside God House, de whole crowd wa been dey beena pray outside een de yaad.
Den een God House, Zechariah see a angel dat de Lawd sen. Dat angel stan fo um pon de right han side ob de alta, weh Zechariah da bun de incense.
Wen Zechariah see de angel, e been opsot. E mos scaid ta det.
De angel tell um say, “Mus dohn feah, Zechariah! De Lawd done yeh ya pray, an e ansa um. Ya wife Lizzybet gwine hab son. Mus name um John.
Ya gwine be glad fa true wen e bon, an a heapa oda people gwine be glad cause e bon!
Dat chile gwine be a great man een de Lawd eye. E mus dohn neba drink no wine or nottin wa mek a poson dronk. An e gwine be full op wid de Holy Sperit eben fo e bon.
E gwine mek a heapa Israel people come ta de Lawd dey God.
E gwine go head ob de Lawd an hab scrong sperit an powa, jes like de prophet Elijah, wa done tell God wod. E gwine mek de fada dem haat ton ta dey chullun. An e gwine mek de people dat ain do wa God wahn, memba God an ondastan wa right fa do. E gwine mek de Lawd people ready fa de time wen de Lawd gwine come.”
Zechariah aks de angel say, “How A spose fa know wa ya say gwine happen? A done ole, an me wife, e ole too.”
De angel ansa um, “A Gabriel. A da stanop fo God, da saab um. E sen me fa come tell ya dis good nyews.
Bot listen yah! Dis ting wa A done tell ya, dat how e gwine be wen de right time come. Bot cause ya ain bleebe me, ya ain gwine be able fa taak. Ya ain gwine crack ya teet til all wa A tell ya done happen.”
All dat time dey, de people outside beena wait fa Zechariah. Dey wonda hoccome e stay so long eenside God House.
Wen e come out, e ain been able fa taak ta de people, so dey figga fa true e been hab wision eenside God House. E jes beena mek sign wid e han, an e ain able fa say nottin.
Wen e time been op fa wok een God House, Zechariah gone home.
Atta wile, e wife Lizzybet been speckin. An Lizzybet hide eenside e house fibe mont.
E say, “De Lawd been good ta me fa true an bless me fa be wid chile. Now e done tek way me shame so dat people ain gwine look down pon me no mo!”
Wen Lizzybet been speckin, een e six mont God sen e angel Gabriel ta Nazareth, a town een Galilee.
God sen um ta one nyoung ooman name Mary. E ain know nottin bout no man yet, bot e been gage fa marry a man name Joseph, wa been one ob King David kin people.
Dat angel come ta Mary say, “How ya da do, Mary. De Lawd done bless ya fa true! E da trabel longside ya!”
Wen Mary yeh wa de angel say, e beena trouble tommuch, an e study e head fa try fa figga wa dat mean.
De angel tell um say, “Mus dohn be scaid, Mary, cause God heppy wid ya.
Ya gwine be wid chile. Ya gwine hab son. Mus gim name Jedus.
E gwine be great. Dey gwine call um de Son ob de Mos High God. An de Lawd God gwine mek um king fa rule jes like e ole people leada King David.
Jedus gwine hab tority faeba oba de fambly ob Jacob. E gwine rule oba um faeba an eba!”
Mary aks de angel say, “A ain neba been wid no man. So hoccome a gwine hab chile?”
De angel ansa um, “De Holy Sperit gwine come ta ya. De High God dat great mo den all, e gwine sen e powa pon ya fa do dis. Cause ob dat, people gwine call dis chile fom God wa ya gwine hab, de God Chile, God own Son.
Fodamo, Lizzybet, wa kin ta ya, e wid chile. Eben dough e way too ole fa hab chullun, e een e six mont. Now ebrybody tink say, Lizzybet ain able fa hab chile. Stillyet, e gwine hab son.
Cause dey ain nottin dat God ain able fa do.”
Mary tell um say, “A ready fa saab de Lawd. A ready fa saab um jes like ya done say.” Den de angel gone lef um.
Soon atta dat, Mary git ready. E mek hace an gone ta a town een Judea een de hill country.
E gone ta Zechariah house, an e hail Lizzybet.
Wen Lizzybet yeh Mary boice, e baby eenside um jomp roun. An Lizzybet been full op wid de Holy Sperit.
E raise e boice loud, tell Mary say, “God da bless ya mo den all oda ooman, an same time e bless de chile wa ya da cyaa!
A ain feel wody fa hab dis great ting happen ta me, dat de modda ob me Lawd come wisit me.
Cause same time A yeh ya boice, dis chile wa A da cyaa, e jomp roun fa joy.
Ya bless fa true, Mary, cause ya bleebe de Lawd gwine do all dat e done tell ya!”
Mary say, “Een me haat A da praise de Lawd.
God wa sabe me done mek me haat glad fa true.
E done memba me, e humble saabant! Fom now on, all people gwine say A been bless fa true.
Cause God wa got powa oba all ting, e done do great ting fa me. E name holy fa sho.
E da show mussy ta all dem wa feah um, fom one generation ta de nex.
E done show de great scrent een e aam. E done scatta dem wa proud an mek um ron way.
E done pull down de mighty king dem fom off dey shrone, an gii tority ta de humble.
E done gii plenty good ting ta dem wa hongry. Bot e done sen way de rich. E ain gim nottin.
E done hep de Israel people, wa da saab um. E ain fagit e promise.
E keep e wod wa e gii ta we ole people. E show mussy ta Abraham an all e chullun faeba!”
Mary stay dey wid Lizzybet bout shree mont. Den e gone home.
De time come fa Lizzybet fa go een, an e hab son.
E neighba dem an e kin yeh say de Lawd done hab mussy pon Lizzybet. E gim chile. An all dem rejaice wid um.
Eight day atta de chile been bon, dey come togeda fa circumcise de chile. Dey been gwine gim name Zechariah, like e fada.
Cep e modda Lizzybet tell um say, “No! E name spose fa be John.”
Wen Lizzybet say dat, de people tell um say, “Bot ya ain got no kin people name John!”
So dey mek sign ta e fada Zechariah fa aks um wa e wahn de chile name fa be.
Zechariah mek sign ta dem, aks fa sompin fa write pon. Den e write down say, “E name John.” All de people been stonish.
Same time Zechariah boice come back, an e staat fa taak. E da praise God.
All de neighba wa yeh Zechariah been scruck. Dey taak bout dis ting, an de nyews git roun all oba Judea een de hill country.
An all dem wa yeh dis ting, study bout um say, “Wa dis chile yah gwine be?” Cause fa true de Lawd powa been dey pon um.
Zechariah, John fada, been full op wid de Holy Sperit, an e tell God wod. E say,
“Leh we praise de Lawd, de God ob de Israel people! Cause e done come fa hep e people. E done set um free.
E done sen we scrong poson wa gwine sabe we. An dis Poson blongst ta de fambly ob David, de ole people leada wa saab God.
God own prophet dem, dey promise fom way back.
Dey say, ‘Dis poson gwine sabe we fom we enemy. E gwine sabe we fom de powa ob all dem people wa hate we.’
God hab mussy pon we, jes like e been tell we ole people. E stillyet memba de greement wa e esef done mek wid um.
E promise we ole people leada Abraham an mek a wow.
E say e gwine sabe we fom we enemy dem so we ain gwine be scaid fa saab um.
We gwine be God own people, da waak scraight fo um all de time we lib.
Me chile, dey gwine call ya de prophet wa taak fa de Mos High God. Cause ya gwine git de people dem ready fa de time wen de Lawd gwine come.
Ya gwine tell e people say God gwine paadon dey sin, an dat how e gwine sabe um.
Cause we God feel wa we feel, an e mussyful an do we good. E gwine mek de light ob sabation fa shine pon we like de sun ob day clean broad.
Dat light gwine shine pon all de people wa lib een de daak shada ob det. E gwine hep we waak a peaceable way.”
An wiles de chile John da grow big, e da come close ta God mo an mo. E beena lib een de wildaness til de time come fa wok mongst de Israel people.
Een dat time, Caesar Augustus been de rula ob de Roman people. E mek a law een all de town een de wol weh e hab tority, say, “Ebrybody haffa go ta town fa count by de head an write down e name.”
Dis been de fus time dey count by de head, jurin de time Quirinius de gobna ob Syria country.
So den, ebrybody gone fa count by de head, ta e own town weh e ole people been bon.
Now Joseph same fashion gone fom Nazareth town een Galilee. E trabel ta de town name Betlem een Judea, weh de ole people leada, King David, been bon. Joseph gone dey cause e blongst ta David fambly.
E gone fa count by de head, an Mary gone long wid um. E gage fa marry um. An Mary been speckin.
Same time wen dey been dey, time come fa Mary gone een.
E hab boy chile, e fusbon. E wrop um op een closs wa been teah eenta scrip an lay um een a trough weh dey feed de cow an oda animal dem. Cause Mary an Joseph beena stay weh de animal sleep. Dey ain been no room fa dem eenside de bodin house.
Now some shephud been dey een de fiel dat night. Dey beena stay dey, da mind dey sheep.
Den one angel ob de Lawd appeah ta um. De night time done lightnin op jes like day clean broad. Cause ob dat, de shephud mos scaid ta det.
Bot de angel tell um say, “Mus dohn feah! A hab good nyews wa gwine mek ebrybody rejaice.
Cause A come fa tell oona, ‘Right now, dis day, a Sabior done bon fa oona. E Christ de Lawd. An e bon een David town!’
A gwine tell oona wa oona gwine see dey. Cause ob dat, oona gwine know A done tell oona de trute. Oona gwine find de chile wrop op een closs wa been teah eenta scrip, an e been leddown een a trough.”
All ob a sudden, a heapa oda angel fom heaben been longside dat angel. Dey all da praise God, say,
“Leh we gii glory ta God een de mos high heaben. Leh dey be peace ta dem een de wol wa hab God fabor!”
Den de angel lef um an gone back ta heaben. An de shephud dem say ta one noda, “Leh we go ta Betlem fa see dis ting wa happen oba dey. De Lawd esef done sen e angel fa tell we.”
So de shephud dem mek hace an gone ta Betlem fa look. Wen dey git dey, dey find Mary an Joseph an de chile. An dat chile been leddown een a trough.
Atta de shephud shim, dey done tell ebrybody bout de chile. Dey tell um all wa de angel done say consaanin um.
An all de people wa de shephud dem tell been stonish.
Mary memba all dis ting an study bout um.
De shephud dem gone back ta dey fiel. Dey da praise God. Dey da rejaice tommuch fa all dey done see an yeh. All wa de angel done tell um, e stan jes like e say.
Eight day atta de chile bon, e been time fa circumcise um. Dey name um Jedus, jes like de angel done been gim fo e modda Mary been speckin.
De time come fa Joseph an Mary fa go ta God House fa do dem ting wa gwine mek um clean een God eye, like de Law wa God gii Moses say dey mus do. Den dey cyaa de chile ta Jerusalem ta God House fa offa um ta de Lawd.
Cause de Law ob de Lawd say, “Ebry fusbon son gwine blongst ta de Lawd fa do God wok.”
An Joseph an Mary gone too fa gii God two tottledob or two nyoung pigeon. Dey gim ta de Jew priest fa mek sacrifice ta God cause de Law ob de Lawd say fa do dat.
Dat time dey, one man name Simeon lib een Jerusalem. Dis man beena waak scraight fa do all wa God wahn, an e lob God. E beena wait fa de time wen God gwine sabe de Israel people. An de Holy Sperit beena lib een um.
Dat Holy Sperit done tell um say, “Fa sho, ya gwine see de Messiah. God gwine sen um fo ya pass oba.”
An God Sperit tell Simeon fa go eenta God House. Wiles e been dey, Joseph an Mary cyaa een de chile Jedus fa offa um op ta de Lawd an do dem ting wa God Law say.
Simeon tek de chile een e aam, an e praise God say,
“Lawd, A ya saabant. Ya done do wa ya promise me. So now leh me pass oba een peace.
Cause wid me own eye A done see de one wa gwine sabe all people een de wol.
Ya done mek um ready een de open weh all people kin shim.
E de light wa gwine mek dem dat ain Jew know ya trute, an bring glory ta ya Israel people.”
Ebryting dat Simeon say bout de chile Jedus stonish e fada an modda.
Simeon aks God fa bless um, an e tell Mary, e modda, say, “Fa true, God done pick dis chile fa come. Wen dey shim, plenty Israel people gwine be stroy cause dey ain bleebe um. An plenty oda Israel people gwine bleebe um, an God gwine sabe dem. God sen Jedus fa sho we wa God wahn we fa do. Bot a heapa people gwine taak ginst um.
Dat how dey gwine show ebrybody wa dey beena tink, wa nobody ain been know. An wen all dis happen, Mary, ya own haat gwine hut tommuch, gwine hut like a sode been jook een um.”
One prophet ooman been dey. E name Anna, an e fada been Phanuel wa blongst ta Asher kin people. Now Anna been a ole ooman. E husban done been dead long time. Fom de time wen Anna marry, e been jes seben yeah fo e husban pass oba.
An now Anna been a wida ooman eighty-fo yeah ole. All de time e beena come ta God House. Day an night e been dey dey, da woshup God an fast an pray.
Now den, Anna come ta God House de same time Joseph an Mary come da bring Jedus een dey. An Anna tank God fa de chile Jedus. E taak bout um ta all dem wa beena wait fa see God set de people een Jerusalem free.
Wen Joseph an Mary done do all de ting wa de Law ob de Lawd say, dey gone back ta dey own town, Nazareth, een Galilee.
An de chile Jedus da grow big an scrong. An e been git plenty sense. An God been heppy wid um.
Ebry yeah Joseph an Mary, Jedus fada an modda, gone ta Jerusalem fa de Jew holiday feas dey call de Passoba.
Wen Jedus been een e tweb yeah, e gone long wid um ta de Passoba feas, like all de Israel people beena do.
Atta de feas done oba, dey staat fa home, cep de boy Jedus ain gone long wid um. E stay dey een Jerusalem. An Mary an Joseph ain know.
Dey beena tink Jedus gone long een de crowd. Dey done trabel all day, an den dey find out dat e ain been dey. Dey saach fa um mongst dey fambly an dey fren.
Bot dey ain find um. So dey gone back ta Jerusalem fa saach fa um.
Atta shree day done gone, dey find Jedus een God House, da seddown mongst de Jew teacha dem. An e beena listen ta wa dem teacha say, an e beena aks um plenty ting too.
All de people wa yeh Jedus been stonish cause de chile hab sommuch sense an mek ansa ta de queshon.
Wen e modda an e fada shim, dey been stonish down. An e modda aks um say, “Me son, wa mek ya do we like dis? Ya fada an me beena saach ebryweh fa ya. An wen we ain see ya, we beena fret tommuch.”
Jedus ansa um say, “Hoccome oona beena saach fa me? Ain oona know dat A been spose fa be yah een me Fada house fa tek cyah ob e bidness?”
Bot dey ain hab de ondastandin fa know wa e da taak bout.
Den Jedus gone back wid um ta Nazareth, an e pay um mind. E modda memba all dem ting een e haat, an e study bout um.
Jedus beena grow een e mind an een e body. An God an de people been heppy wid um.
Now den, Caesar Tiberius been de rula ob de Roman people. Wen e been rule fifteen yeah, Pontius Pilate been gobna ob Judea. Herod beena rule een Galilee, an e broda, Philip, beena rule een Iturea an Trachonitis. An Lysanias beena rule een Abilene.
Annas an Caiaphas been head ob de Jew priest dem. Same time, God gii John, Zechariah son, e wod fa tell people. An John been dey een de wildaness.
So John gone waak bout all de arie close ta de Jerden Riba. E beena preach say, “Ef oona change oona sinful way an dohn do um no mo, A gwine bactize oona an God gwine paadon oona fa de ebil oona done.”
John beena do jes like de prophet Isaiah done write down een e book say, “Somebody da holla een de wildaness say, ‘Oona mus cleah de road weh de Lawd gwine come. Mek de pat scraight fa um fa waak!
All de walley mus be full op, an ebry mountain an hill mus ton ta flat groun. De crooked road mus scraighten, an de bad road mus be smood.
An ebrybody een de wol gwine see how God da sabe e people!’ ”
A whole heapa people come fa hab John bactize um. John tell um say, “Oona wickity, jes like snake! Who tell oona dat ef oona git bactize, oona kin git way fom de jedgiment wa God gwine sen fa punish oona?
Oona mus do dem ting wa show oona done change oona way. Mus dohn tink say, ‘We de chullun ob Abraham.’ Dat ain gwine sabe oona. A da tell oona, God able fa tek dem stone yah an ton um eenta Abraham chullun!
Now de ax ta de foot ob de tree. Ebry tree wa ain beah good fruit, God gwine cut um down an chunk um een de fire.”
De crowd aks John say, “Wa we haffa do now fa git way fom God jedgiment?”
E ansa um say, “Anybody wa got two coat mus gii one ta de poson wa ain got none. Same fashion, ebrybody mus share wa e got fa nyam.”
Some tax man too come fa hab John bactize um. An dey aks um say, “Teacha, wa we mus do fa sho we done change we way?”
John ansa um say, “Mus dohn tek no mo money fom de people den de Roman gobment tell oona fa tek.”
Some sodja dem aks um too, say, “An we, wa we haffa do?” E tell um say, “Mus dohn fight fa tek people money. Needa, mus dohn lie on people fa git money. Mus be sattify wid de pay oona git.”
All de people beena hab high hope, da look fa sompin fa happen. An dey beena study dey head, da wonda ef John been de Messiah.
John ansa um all say, “A da bactize oona wid wata. Bot de one wa hab heap mo tority den me gwine come. A ain fit eben fa loose e shoe. E gwine bactize oona wid de Holy Sperit an wid fire.
E gwine jedge all de people an separate um op like a faama wa hab e pitfork een e han fa separate out de chaff fom de wheat. E gwine geda de good wheat an pit um een e baan. Bot de chaff, e gwine bun um een de ebalastin fire.”
John preach ta de people, laan um plenty ting bout de Good Nyews an coax um fa change dey way.
Bot John beena buke Gobna Herod cause e done marry Herodias, e broda wife, an cause Herod done plenty oda ebil ting.
Den pontop ob all dem oda ebil ting Herod beena do, e sen e man dem fa git John, lock um op een de jailhouse.
Wen John beena bactize all de people, dat same time e bactize Jedus. An wiles Jedus da pray dey, de sky open op.
An de Holy Sperit tek shape like a dob an come light pon Jedus. Den a boice fom heaben say, “Ya me Son wa A lob. A sho please wid ya.”
Jedus been bout tirty yeah ole wen e staat fa do e wok wa God sen um fa do mongst de people. An de people beena tink say, Joseph been Jedus fada. Joseph fada been name Heli.
Heli fada been name Matthat. Matthat fada been name Levi. Levi fada been name Melchi. Melchi fada been name Jannai. Jannai fada been name Joseph.
Joseph fada been name Mattathias. Mattathias fada been name Amos. Amos fada been name Nahum. Nahum fada been name Esli. Esli fada been name Naggai.
Naggai fada been name Maath. Maath fada been name Mattathias. Mattathias fada been name Semein. Semein fada been name Josech. Josech fada been name Joda.
Joda fada been name Joanan. Joanan fada been name Rhesa. Rhesa fada been name Zerubbabel. Zerubbabel fada been name Shealtiel. Shealtiel fada been name Neri.
Neri fada been name Melchi. Melchi fada been name Addi. Addi fada been name Cosam. Cosam fada been name Elmadam. Elmadam fada been name Er.
Er fada been name Joshua. Joshua fada been name Eliezer. Eliezer fada been name Jorim. Jorim fada been name Matthat. Matthat fada been name Levi.
Levi fada been name Simeon. Simeon fada been name Judah. Judah fada been name Joseph. Joseph fada been name Jonam. Jonam fada been name Eliakim.
Eliakim fada been name Melea. Melea fada been name Menna. Menna fada been name Mattatha. Mattatha fada been name Nathan. Nathan fada been name David.
David fada been name Jesse. Jesse fada been name Obed. Obed fada been name Boaz. Boaz fada been name Salmon. Salmon fada been name Nahshon.
Naasson fada been name Amminadab. Amminadab fada been name Aram. Aram fada been name Hezron. Hezron fada been name Perez. Perez fada been name Judah.
Judah fada been name Jacob. Jacob fada been name Isaac. Isaac fada been name Abraham. Abraham fada been name Terah. Terah fada been name Nahor.
Nahor fada been name Serug. Serug fada been name Reu. Reu fada been name Peleg. Peleg fada been name Eber. Eber fada been name Shelah.
Shelah fada been name Cainan. Cainan fada been name Arphaxad. Arphaxad fada been name Shem. Shem fada been name Noah. Noah fada been name Lamech.
Lamech fada been name Methuselah. Methuselah fada been name Enoch. Enoch fada been name Jared. Jared fada been name Mahalaleel. Mahalaleel fada been name Cainan.
Cainan fada been name Enos. Enos fada been name Seth. Seth fada been name Adam. Adam fada been God.
Jedus come back fom de Jerden Riba, an e been full op wid de Holy Sperit. De Sperit lead um eenta de wildaness.
Jedus been dey foty day. An all dat time de Debil beena try fa mek um do some ebil ting. Jedus ain nyam nottin jurin dat time. So wen dem foty day done pass, e been hongry down.
De Debil tell um say, “Since ya God Son, mek dis rock yah ton ta bread.”
Jedus ansa um say, “Dey write down een God Book say, ‘People ain able fa lib fa true lessin dey got mo den sompin fa nyam. Dey lib by ebry wod wa God gim.’ ”
De Debil tek Jedus op a high place an show um all de country een de wol at one time.
E tell Jedus say, “A gwine gii ya powa fa rule oba all dem country yah an all de good ting dem dey, wa mek people too heppy. Cause all dem ting yah blongst ta me now, an A able fa gim ta anybody A wahn.
A gwine gii ya all dem ting ef ya bow down an woshup me op.”
Jedus ansa um say, “Dey write down een God Book, say, ‘Mus woshup de Lawd ya God an mus dohn saab nobody cep um.’ ”
De Debil tek Jedus ta Jerusalem an set um op pon de mos high paat ob God House. E tell Jedus say, “Since ya God Son, shrow yasef down fom yah.
Cause dey write down een God Book say, ‘God gwine gii orda ta e angel dem, tell um fa tek cyah ob ya so dat nottin ain gwine haam ya.’
An e say too, ‘De angel dem gwine tote ya een dey han, so dat ya ain gwine hut eben ya foot pon a rock.’ ”
Jedus ansa um, “Dey write down een God Book, say, ‘Mus dohn tempt de Lawd ya God fa jes do wa ya wahn.’ ”
Wen de Debil done try fa mek Jedus do ebil een all kind ob way an e ain able fa tempt um, e gone an lef Jedus fa leetle wile.
Jedus gone back ta Galilee wid de powa ob God Sperit, an de nyews bout Jedus git roun ebryweh een de whole arie.
Jedus beena laan de people een all dey meetin house, an ebrybody praise um.
Jedus gone ta Nazareth, weh e lib fom de time e been a leetle chile til e git big. Wen de Jew Woshup Day come, e gone ta de meetin house like done all de time, an e stanop fa read God Book ta de people.
Dey gim de book wa de prophet Isaiah been write. So den, Jedus open de book ta de place weh Isaiah write, say,
“De Sperit ob de Lawd pon me. E done pick me fa tell de Good Nyews ta de po people. E done sen me fa tell dem wa ain free, say, ‘Oona gwine be free.’ E sen me fa tell de bline people, say, ‘Oona gwine see gin.’ E sen me fa free dem wa da suffa.
An e sen me fa tell de people say, ‘De time done come wen de Lawd gwine sabe e people.’ ”
Den Jedus shet de book an gim ta de man wa tek cyah ob de book an e seddown. Ebrybody een de meetin house fasten e eye pon um.
An Jedus tell um say, “Taday dis paat ob God Book done come true, same time oona yeh um.”
De people dem all taak good bout Jedus. Dey stonish cause e know how fa pit e wod jes so. An dey say, “Ain dis Joseph boy?”
An Jedus tell um say, “Fa sho, oona gwine tell me dat ole wise wod, say, ‘Docta, mek yasef well!’ Oona gwine say, ‘All dem miracle wa we yeh say ya done een Capernaum, ya mus do de same ting yah weh ya raise op.’ ”
An Jedus say, “A da tell oona fa true, ain no prophet wa eba git hona weh e raise op.
Fa true, de time wen Elijah been een Israel, e ain rain fa shree yeah an six mont. Dey been a dry drought, an de people beena staab een de whole country. An fa sho, plenty wida ooman been dey een Israel.
Stillyet, God ain sen Elijah ta none dem wida ooman een Israel. Steada dat, e jes sen um ta one wida wa lib een Zarephath town een de arie call Sidon.
An de time wen Elisha de prophet beena tell God wod een Israel, plenty people wid leposy been dey, bot Elisha ain mek none dem clean cep fa Naaman, wa come fom Syria.”
Wen de people een de meetin house yeh dat, dey all been mad down.
Dey jomp op an chunk Jedus outta de town. Dey tek um ta de top ob de hill weh dey town been build, fa shrow um oba de edge ob de hill.
Bot Jedus waak shru de middle ob de people an gone pon e way.
Jedus gone down ta Capernaum, a town een Galilee. E beena laan de people dey ebry Jew Woshup Day.
An dey been stonish wen dey yeh um, cause e laan um wid tority fa true.
One ebil sperit been een a man dey een de Jew meetin house, an e holla loud say,
“Leh we be! Jedus fom Nazareth, wa bidness ya got wid we? Ya come fa stroy we? A know who ya da. Ya blongst ta God fa true!”
Jedus chaage dat ebil sperit say, “Dohn crack ya teet! Come out fom eenside dis man!” De ebil sperit shrow de man ta de groun fo all de people, an e lef um. An e ain done de man no haam.
All de people been stonish, an dey tell one noda say, “Wa kind ob wod dis man nyuse? E da taak scrong, wid tority, an e da gii orda ta de ebil sperit an dey come out!”
An de nyews git roun all de town an settlement close by bout wa Jedus da do.
Jedus git op an lef de meetin house an gone ta Simon house. Simon wife modda been bad off sick wid a high feba, so dey aks Jedus fa hep de sick ooman.
Jedus gone stanop close ta e bed, an e buke de feba, an de feba lef um. Same time de ooman git op an staat fa fix sompin fa dem fa nyam.
Bout fus daak, all de people bring all kind ob sick people ta Jedus. E pit e two han pon um, an all dem been heal.
Fodamo, ebil sperit dem come outta a heapa people. Dem sperit holla say, “Ya God Son!” Jedus chaage um say, “Mus dohn open oona mout!” Cause de ebil sperit been know Jedus de Messiah.
Wen day clean, Jedus lef de town an gone ta a place weh dey ain been no people, an de crowd saach fa um. Wen dey find um, dey try fa keep um dey wid um.
Bot Jedus tell um say, “A haffa go ta all de oda town dem too, fa tell de people de Good Nyews bout how God da rule, cause dat wa God sen me fa do.”
An Jedus gone an preach een de Jew meetin house dem een Judea.
One day, Jedus beena stanop pon de sho ta Lake Gennesaret. All de people crowd bout um fa yeh God wod.
E see two boat dey, pull op pon de sho. De fishaman dem done lef um an beena wash dey net.
Jedus git een a boat wa blongst ta Simon an e tell um say, “Shob off a leetle piece fom de sho.” Den Jedus seddown een de boat an e laan de people wa beena stanop pon de sho.
Wen e git shru de taak, e tell Simon say, “Mus go out ta de deep wata. Ya an ya paatna dem mus cyas oona net fa ketch fish.”
Simon ansa um say, “Massa, we done try all night an we ain ketch nottin. Bot cause ya say fa do um, A gwine cyas de net gin.”
Wen Simon dem been shru cyas dey net, dey ketch sommuch fish til dey net staat fa teah.
Dey mek sign ta dey paatna dem een de oda boat fa come an hep um. Dey come an full op all two de boat dem til dey boat staat fa sink.
Wen Simon Peter see dat, e git down pon e knee fo Jedus, tell um say, “Lawd, mus go way fom me, cause A a sinna man!”
cause Simon dem been stonish wen dey ketch sommuch fish.
Same fashion, e paatna dem, James an John, Zebedee son, dey been stonish. Jedus tell Simon say, “Mus dohn feah. Ya beena ketch fish, bot tareckly, A gwine laan ya fa ketch people fa me.”
Den dey lan dey boat. Dey lef ebryting an gone long wid Jedus fa folla um, fa be e ciple.
One time wen Jedus been ta one town, a man been dey wa been kiba wid leposy. Wen e see Jedus, e git down pon de groun fo um. E beg um say, “Sah, ef ya gree fa do um, ya able fa heal me!”
Jedus scretch out e han an tetch um say, “A wahn fa do um. A mek ya well an clean!” Same time de leposy lef, an de man been well.
Jedus chaage um say, “Mus dohn tell nobody bout dis. Mus go sho yasef ta de Jew priest an offa de sacrifice wa Moses done chaage de people fa mek. Dat gwine mek ebrybody know ya all well now fa sho.”
Bot mo an mo, de people cyaa de nyews roun consaanin Jedus. An plenty crowd come geda roun fa yeh um, an fa hab um heal um.
Bot Jedus lef um an gone off by esef weh dey ain no people, fa pray ta God.
One day wen Jedus beena laan de people, some Pharisee an Jew Law teacha dem beena seddown dey. Dey been come fom ebry town een Galilee an Judea an fom Jerusalem. An de powa ob de Lawd God been wid Jedus fa heal de sick.
Some man dem come long da tote one man wa cripple op an ain able fa moob. Dey beena tote um pon a sleep mat, an dey done try fa gone een de house fa lay de man pon de flo fo Jedus.
Bot sommuch people been dey, de man dem ain able fa git shru de crowd. Dey climb pontop de house wid de sick man, pull off some de roof tile an open op a hole een de house top. Den dey leddown dat sick man pon e sleep mat eenta de middle ob de people dey fo Jedus.
Wen Jedus see dat dey bleebe fa true dat e gwine heal de man, e tell de sick man say, “Me fren, ya sin done been paadon.”
De Law teacha an de Pharisee dem staat fa study bout dat, tink say, “Who dis yah, wa da hole God cheap? Ain nobody able fa paadon sin. Jes God kin do dat!”
Jedus know wa dey beena tink, so e say, “Wa mek oona da tink dat wa A do ain right?
Fa sho, e mo easy fa tell dis cripple op man say, ‘Ya sin done been paadon,’ den fa chaage um say, ‘Git op an waak,’ ainty dough?
A gwine show oona dat de Man wa Come fom God hab tority een dis wol fa paadon people sin.” So Jedus tell de man wa cripple op say, “Git op, tek ya sleep mat an go on home!”
All ob a sudden de man git op right een front ob ebrybody. E tek e mat wa e beena leddown pon an e gone home. E beena praise God cause e done been heal.
All de people been stonish, an dey praise God. Dey been cyaa way, an dey say, “We done see sompin yah taday dat we ain neba been see!”
Atta Jedus done heal de man, e gone outta dey. An e see one man name Levi, wa da geda tax, seddown een e office. Jedus tell um say, “Come folla me fa be me ciple.”
Levi git op. E lef ebryting dey, an e gone folla Jedus.
Levi mek a big feas een e house fa Jedus. Plenty people wa da geda tax been dey an some oda people been dey een de house too, an all dem beena seddown da nyam.
Some Pharisee, long wid some dem own Law teacha, been dey, an dey beena grumble ta Jedus ciple dem say, “Wa mek oona nyam an drink longside dem people wa da geda tax, an dem oda people wa ain fit fa mix wid Jew people?”
Jedus ansa um say, “Dem wa well ain need no docta. Dem wa sick need um.
A ain come fa call dem wa tink dey da waak scraight wid God. A come fa call de sinna dem.”
Some people come ta Jedus say, “John ciple dem da fast plenty time, fa woshup God an pray. De Pharisee ciple dem do dat too. Bot ya own ciple dem jes da nyam an drink an ain fast.”
Jedus ansa um say, “Wen oona call people fa come ta marry feas, oona cyahn keep um fom nyam, ainty?
Bot de time gwine come wen de groom gwine be tek way fom mongst um. Dat de time wen dey gwine fast.”
Jedus tell um a paable, e say, “Nobody gwine teah piece fom nyew cloes fa patch e ole cloes. Ef e do dat, e gwine mek e nyew cloes look bad cause ob de teah. Pontop ob dat, e ole cloes gwine look bad cause de piece wa e teah fom de nyew cloes ain gwine match de ole cloes.
An nobody gwine tek ole bottle an pit een nyew wine wa still da wok. Cause ef e do dat wiles de nyew wine da wok, dat wine gwine buss open de ole bottle. De wine gwine waste an de bottle gwine ruint too.
Steada dat, dey mus pit nyew wine een nyew bottle wa ain gwine broke op.
An wen people done drink ole wine, dey ain gwine wahn fa drink nyew wine, cause dey gwine say, ‘De ole wine a heap mo betta!’ ”
One Jew Woshup Day, Jedus dem beena waak shru de wheat fiel, an e ciple dem pick some de yea ob de wheat. Dey shook um een dey han an nyam um.
Some Pharisee dem aks um say, “Hoccome oona da do dat? Fa sho, dat ginst wa we Jew Law say fa do pon de Woshup Day, ainty?”
Jedus ansa um say, “A mos sho oona done read wa King David done wen e an e man dem been hongry, ainty?
David gone eenside God House, an e tek de bread dat de Jew priest dem done gii ta God. David nyam some ob dat bread an gim ta dem wa been wid um fa nyam. Stillyet, we Law say nobody mus nyam dat bread cep de priest dem.”
Jedus tell um say, “De Man wa Come fom God hab chaage oba de Woshup Day.”
Noda Jew Woshup Day, Jedus gone eenside de Jew meetin house an laan de people. One man been dey wa hab right han dat been flicted.
Some Jew Law teacha an Pharisee dem been wahn fa cuse Jedus, say e da do wrong. So dey fasten dey eye pon um fa see ef e gwine heal de man han pon de Woshup Day.
Bot Jedus know wa dey beena tink, so e tell de man wa han been flicted say, “Git op an come stan yah fo all de people.” De man git op an gone stan dey.
Jedus say ta dem wa watch um, “Leh me aks oona sompin. Wa we Law leh we do pon we Woshup Day? We spose fa do good, or we spose fa do ebil? We spose fa sabe life or we spose fa stroy um?”
Jedus look roun pon all dem. E tell de man wa han been flicted say, “Scretch out ya han!” De man do wa Jedus tell um, an e han git well gin.
De Law teacha an de Pharisee dem been mad down. Dey aks one noda say, “Wa we kin do ta Jedus?”
Jurin dat time Jedus gone op a hill fa pray. E beena pray ta God all shru de night.
Wen day clean, e call e ciple dem fa come ta um, an e pick tweb dem. E gim name postle, dat mean e gwine sen um out fa do e wok.
E pick Simon, wa e gii name Peter, an e broda Andrew, James an John, Philip an Bartholomew,
Matthew an Thomas, James wa been Alphaeus boy, an Simon wa been call de Patrot,
an Judas wa been James boy, an Judas Iscariot, wa ton Jedus een fa money.
An Jedus come down de hill wid e postle dem. E gone an stan weh de groun been lebel, an plenty oda e ciple dem been wid um. An a whole heapa people geda dey. Dey come fom all oba Judea an fom Jerusalem, an some come fom dem town close ta de sho een Tyre an Sidon. Dey come fa yeh Jedus an fa hab um heal um.
Fodamo, dem wa hab ebil sperit come an git heal.
Ebrybody beena try fa tetch Jedus, cause powa beena come out fom um. An dat powa heal all ob um.
Jedus look at e ciple dem an tell um say, “Oona bless fa true, oona po people, cause God da rule oba oona.
Oona bless fa true, oona wa hongry now, cause God gwine gii oona all oona wahn fa nyam. Oona bless fa true, oona wa da cry now, cause oona gwine laugh later on.
Oona bless fa true, wen people hate oona, wen dey ain wahn hab nottin fa do wid oona an hole oona cheap, wen dey say oona ebil. Oona bless fa true, wen dey do all dat cause oona da folla de Man wa Come fom God.
“Mus be heppy wen de time come wen de people do oona dat way. Jomp op wid joy den, cause oona gwine git a whole heapa good ting dat God da keep fa oona een heaben. Mus memba dat de people wa gwine mek oona suffa dem ting yah, dey ole people done done de same ting ta dem wa God been sen fa gii e wod.
“Bot e gwine be a haad time fa oona wa got plenty now, cause oona done hab ebryting easy een dis life yah.
E gwine be a haad time fa oona wa da nyam all wa oona wahn now, cause de time gwine come wen oona gwine be hongry. E gwine be a haad time fa oona wa da laugh now, cause oona gwine be too saary an cry.
E gwine be a haad time fa oona wen ebrybody da praise oona. Dat de same ting oona ole people done done ta dem wa say dey God prophet bot dey ain been fa true.
“Bot A da tell oona wa yeh wa A say, mus lob ya enemy dem. Mus do good ta dem wa hate ya.
Mus aks God fa bless dem wa cuss ya, an mus pray fa dem wa do ya bad.
Ef anybody knock one side ob ya face, mus ton de oda side an leh um knock dat side too. Ef somebody tek ya coat, mus gim ya shat too.
Ef somebody aks ya fa sompin, mus gim. An ef somebody tief sompin wa blongst ta ya, mus dohn aks um fa gim back.
Oona mus do ta ebrybody jes like oona wahn dem fa do ta oona.
“Ef ya jes lob dem wa lob ya, ya ain done nottin fa git praise fa, ainty? Cause eben dem people wa ain try fa do wa God say, dey lob people wa lob dem!
An ef ya do good jes ta dem wa do good ta ya, ya ain done nottin fa git praise fa, ainty? Cause same fashion, eben dem wa ain try fa do wa God say, dey da do dat too!
Ef ya lend ting jes ta dem wa ya spect gwine pay ya back, ya ain done nottin fa git praise fa, ainty? Cause same fashion, eben dem wa ain try fa do wa God say, dey lend ting an spect fa git um back!
Bot ya mus lob ya enemy dem. Mus do um good. Wen ya da lend ya enemy sompin, mus dohn spect fa git payback. Wen ya ain look fa payback, ya gwine git payback wid big blessin, an ya gwine be chullun ob de Mos High God. Cause God good ta eben dem wa ain preciate nottin, an dem wa lib wickity.
Mus hab mussy pon all people jes like God, oona Fada, e hab mussy pon ebrybody.
“Oona mus dohn jedge oda people. Den God esef ain gwine jedge oona. Mus dohn condemn. Den God esef ain gwine condemn oona. Mus fagib oda people. Den God esef gwine fagib oona.
Mus gii ta oda people. Den God esef gwine gii ta oona. E gwine gii ya plenty, jes like wen people full op a basket wid sompin an dey mash um down. Dey shake um bout an pile um op til e ron oba de top ob de basket. So ef ya gii plenty, God gwine gii ya plenty. Ef ya ain gii plenty, God ain gwine gii ya plenty.”
Jedus tell um a paable say, “A bline poson ain able fa sho oda bline poson de road, ainty? Cause den, dey all two gwine faddown eenta de ditch.
Anybody wa da laan ain mo betta den de one wa da laan um. Bot anybody wa laan good ebryting wa e fa laan, e gwine know all, jes like de one wa laan um.
“Wa mek ya see de leetle splinta ob wood een ya broda eye, bot ya ain pay no mind ta de big log een ya own eye.
How ya gwine tell ya broda say, ‘Broda, leh me tek dat leetle splinta out ya eye,’ wen ya ain eben pay no mind ta de big log een ya own eye? Oona hypicrit! Fus mus tek de big log outta ya own eye. Den ya kin see plain fa tek dat leetle splinta outta ya broda eye.
“A tree wa da grow good ain beah no bad fruit, an a tree wa ain da grow good ain beah no good fruit.
Oona gwine know ef de tree good or bad by de fruit wa e da beah. Oona ain gwine geda fig fom de briah patch, an oona ain gwine pick grape fom a bramble bush.
De same way so, a good poson da do good cause e hab plenty good ting een e haat, an a bad poson da do bad cause e hab plenty bad ting een e haat. De wod wa come out oona mout come fom all dem ting wa pile op een oona haat, wa oona da study bout all de time.
“Oona ain do wa A tell oona fa do, so hoccome oona da call me, ‘Lawd, Lawd’?
Anybody wa come ta me an yeh me wod an do wa A tell um, A gwine show oona how e stan.
E stan jes like a man wa da build a house. E dig way down een de groun til e find de rock an lay de foundation pontop ob dat rock. Wen de flood come, a whole heapa wata hit dat house, bot de house ain moob. Nottin happen ta um, cause de man done build um pon de rock.
Bot anybody wa yeh me wod an ain do wa A tell um fa do, stan jes like a man wa build e house pontop ob de groun. E ain dig down fa lay de foundation. Soon as de flood hit dat house, e faddown. Bam! E smash op!”
Atta Jedus done tell de people all dis, e gone ta de town name Capernaum.
One sodja high op een de Roman aamy been dey. E hab saabant wa e like a whole heap, bot dat saabant been sick til e mos dead.
Wen dat offisa yeh bout Jedus, e sen some ob de Jew leada dem ta Jedus fa beg um fa come heal e saabant.
De leada dem gone ta Jedus an beg um wid all dey haat fa come heal de saabant ob de sodja. Dey tell um say, “Dis sodja a good man an e good fa hep um.
Cause e lob de Jew people, an e de one wa done build de Jew meetin house fa we yah.”
So Jedus gone long wid um. Wen e git close ta de house, de sodja sen e fren dem wid a message fa Jedus. E tell um say, “Sah, mus dohn bodda yasef fa come yah, cause A ain fit fa hab ya come eenta me house.
Cause ob dat, A ain tink A fit fa come ta ya needa. Bot do please, say de wod an me saabant gwine git well.
A mesef a man onda tority ob offisa oba me, an A hab tority oba oda sodja dem wa onda me. A tell one say, ‘Mus go!’ an e gone. An A tell noda one say, ‘Mus come!’ an e come. An A tell me saabant say, ‘Mus do dis wok!’ an e do um.”
Wen Jedus yeh wa de offisa done say, e been stonish. E ton roun ta de crowd wa beena gone long wid um, an e say, “A da tell oona, A ain neba see nobody eben yah een Israel wa bleebe een God sommuch like dis Roman sodja bleebe!”
Wen dem wa bring de message git back ta de sodja house, dey find dat de saabant done git well.
De day atta dat, Jedus gone ta one town wa dey call Nain, an e ciple dem an a heapa oda people gone long wid um.
Wen dey git ta de gate ob de wall wa go roun de town, dey meet plenty people gwine fa bury a man. Dat man wa dead been e modda onliest son. E been a wida ooman, an a whole crowd ob people fom de town been long wid um.
Wen de Lawd see de ooman, e haat been hebby fa um, an e tell um say, “Mus dohn cry!”
E gone oba an tetch de coffin, an de man dem wa beena tote de coffin, dey stop. Jedus tell de dead man say, “Nyoung man, A da tell ya say, mus git op.”
De nyoung man wa been dead, e set op an staat fa taak. An Jedus gim ta e modda.
All de people been scruck an stonish, an dey praise God, say, “We done see one prophet mongst we!” An dey say, “God done come fa hep e people!”
Dis nyews bout Jedus git roun shru Judea an all de arie close by.
John ciple dem gone tell um bout all dem ting.
John call two ob e ciple dem, sen um ta de Lawd Jedus fa aks um say, “Ya de one wa been gwine fa come, or we spose fa look fa somebody else?”
Wen de man dem git ta Jedus, dey tell um say, “John wa Bactize sen we fa aks ya ef ya de one wa been gwine fa come, or we spose fa look fa somebody else.”
Dat same time, Jedus beena heal plenty people. E heal dem wa sick, an e dribe out ebil sperit wa been een some ob de people, an e mek a heapa bline people see.
So Jedus ansa dem wa John sen, say, “Mus go back, tell John wa oona done see an wa oona done yeh. De people wa been bline, dey kin see. De cripple op people da waak. Dem wa hab leposy, dey git clean. De deef people able fa yeh, an dem wa done dead git op an lib gin. An de po people da yeh de Good Nyews.
De one wa ain got no doubt bout me, e bless fa true!”
Now wen dem wa John sen done gone back, Jedus tell de great crowd bout John. E say, “Wen oona gone ta John een de wildaness, wa oona been spect fa see? Oona spect fa see a piece ob grass wa da bend down wen de breeze da blow? No, oona ain gone fa see dat.
Den wa oona gone fa see? Oona gone fa see a man dress op een fine cloes? No, oona ain gone fa see dat. Cause dem wa rich an dress op een fine cloes, dey lib een house wa blongst ta king dem.
Bot fa true, wa oona gone fa see? Oona gone fa see a prophet, ainty? An A da tell oona de trute, oona done see de man wa a heap mo greata den de oda prophet dem.
John de one dey been write bout een God wod, say, ‘A gwine sen me messenja fa go head ob ya fa cleah de road an mek um ready fa ya.’
A da tell oona say, John mo greata den all de people wa eba lib. Stillyet, de poson wa leas ob all dem people wa God da rule, dat poson mo greata den John!”
Wen all de people, eben dem wa da geda tax, yeh Jedus, dey gree wid um, say dat God way, e right. Cause dey done hab John bactize um.
Bot de Pharisee dem an de Jew Law teacha dem, dey ain gree fa do wa God wahn um fa do, cause dey ain hab John bactize um.
Jedus say, “De people dat lib een dis day yah, wa kin A say dey like? How dey stan?
Dem people stan like chullun wa da seddown ta de maakut. An dey da holla ta oda chullun, say, ‘We done play music fa oona, bot oona ain dance! We done sing sompin saaful, bot oona ain cry!’
Wen John wa Bactize come, e fast fa woshup God an e ain drink no wine. Bot oona say, ‘A ebil sperit een John.’
Now wen de Man wa Come fom God come, e da nyam an drink. An oona say, ‘Look, dis man yah da pack e gut an e a dronka! Dem people wa da geda tax an dem oda people wa ain fit fa mix wid Jew people, dem e fren!’
Stillyet, dem wa da do wa God tell um fa do, dey gwine show dat God wise fa true.”
One Pharisee come aks Jedus fa nyam wid um. Jedus gree an gone wid de Pharisee ta e house an seddown fa nyam.
A ooman been dey een dat town wa beena lib loose life. Wen de ooman yeh say Jedus beena nyam ta de Pharisee house, e cyaa a white stone bottle dat been full op wid spensiz pafume, an e gone ta de house.
De ooman stanop hine Jedus, close ta e foot. E staat fa cry, an e cry sommuch til de wata outta e eye wet op Jedus foot. So den, e dry Jedus foot wid e hair. E kiss e foot an e tek de pafume an rub um pon Jedus foot.
Wen de Pharisee wa aks Jedus fa come fa nyam wid um see dat, e tink say, “Ef dis yah man been a prophet fa true, e been gwine know wa kinda ooman dis yah, wa da tetch um an rub um wid pafume. Cause dis ooman da lib a loose life.”
Jedus ansa de Pharisee say, “Simon, A got sompin fa tell ya.” De Pharisee say, “Wa dat, Teacha?”
Jedus say, “Dey been two man wa beena owe a man wa lend people money. One man owe um fibe hundud silba coin, an de oda owe um fifty silba coin.
Bot all two ob dem ain been able fa pay um back. So de man wa lend de money tell dem bof say, ‘Ya ain haffa pay me back de money.’ Now den, wish one ob dem two gwine lob dat man mo?”
Simon ansa Jedus say, “A spose de man wa owe um mo money.” Jedus tell um, “Ya done jedge right.”
Den Jedus ton ta da ooman an e still beena taak ta Simon. E say, “Ya see dis ooman, yah? Wen A come eenta ya house, ya ain gii me no wata fa wash me foot. Bot dis ooman yah done cry pon me foot, til me foot wet an e done dry um wid e hair.
Wen A come eenta ya house, ya ain welcome me wid one kiss, bot eba since A been yah, dis ooman beena kiss me foot.
Ya ain rub no olib oll pontop me head fa mek me feel betta, bot dis ooman done rub spensiz pafume pon me foot.
Cause ob dat, A da tell ya say, de ting wa dis ooman done show e lob me a whole heap. Dat show God done paadon e sin, an dey been a whole heap. Bot wen God paadon a poson wa ain sin a whole heap, dat poson gwine lob me jes a leetle bit.”
Jedus tell de ooman say, “Ya sin done been paadon.”
De oda people dat beena nyam wid Jedus staat fa say ta one noda, “Who dis man yah? E eben paadon people fa dey sin!”
Jedus tell de ooman, “Cause ya bleebe een me, God done sabe ya. Ya kin go now an hab peace een ya haat.”
Soon atta dat, Jedus an de tweb ciple dem gone fom one town an settlement ta noda, da tell all de people de Good Nyews bout how God rule oba people.
Some ooman wa Jedus done heal gone long wid Jedus dem too. Some dem done been sick, an some done been hab ebil sperit. Mary, wa dey call Magdalene, been dey. Jedus done dribe out seben ebil sperit outta um.
An Joanna, Chuza wife, been dey. Dat de Chuza wa tek cyah ob King Herod place. An Susanna an plenty oda ooman all gone long wid Jedus dem an gim dey own money an ting fa hep um.
De people beena come out fom all de town dem fa yeh Jedus. An wen a big crowd done geda, Jedus tell um one paable.
E say, “One faama gone ta e fiel fa plant seed. Wiles e beena scatta de seed, some fall long de pat. People waak pontop ob um, an de bod dem nyam um op.
Some seed fall pontop ob groun full op wid rock. De seed sprout an staat fa grow, bot dey wilta cause dey ain git no wata dey pon de rock.
Some seed fall eenta de briah. De briah choke um til de seed cyahn grow.
An some seed fall pon good groun. Dey grow good crop, a hundud time mo den wa e staat wid.” Wen Jedus done tell de paable, e say, “Oona got yea fa yeh, ainty? Den oona mus yeh wa A da say!”
Jedus ciple dem aks um wa dat paable mean.
Jedus ansa um say, “God gii oona de chance fa ondastan dem secret bout how e da rule. Bot fa de oda people, A da tell paable so dat dey kin look, bot eben dough dey look, dey ain gwine see. Dey kin yeh, bot dey ain gwine ondastan.
“Dis yah wa de paable bout de seed mean: De seed, dat God wod.
De seed wa fall long de pat, dat like people wa yeh God wod, bot den de Debil come long an tek way de wod fom dey haat. So dey ain bleebe um, an dey ain git sabe needa.
De seed wa faddown pontop de groun wa full ob wid rock, dat like de people wa yeh God wod, an dey heppy fa yeh um. Bot dey ain bleebe um een dey haat fa true. Dey like de seed pontop de rock dat staat fa grow, bot e ain hab no root. Dem people bleebe jes a leetle wile. Wen de Debil test um, dey ain bleebe God wod no mo.
An dem seed wa fall eenta de briah, dat like de people wa yeh God wod, bot leetle by leetle dey staat fa fret bout de ting dem dey got. Dey fret all de time bout dey plenty money an ting an dey pledja een dis wol. Dem ting choke out God wod een dey haat, an dey crop ain mount ta nottin.
Bot de seed wa fall pon de good groun, dat like de people wa yeh God wod an hole um een dey haat. Dey da do wa God wod say. Dey ain stop fa bleebe, an dey hep plenty oda people bleebe. Dey mek good crop.”
“Ain nobody gwine light a lamp an den kiba um op wid a bowl, needa pit um ondaneet de bed. E da pit um pontop de table, so dat dem wa come een de house kin see.
Dey ain nottin wa been hide wa ain gwine come out een de open. An ain nottin wa been done een de daak wa ain gwine come out ta de light fa people fa yeh bout um.
“So den, oona mus watch out how oona listen. Cause fa dem wa got sompin, God gwine gim mo. An dem wa ain got nottin, God gwine tek way eben dat leetle bit wa dey tink dey got.”
Jedus modda an e broda dem come ta um. Bot dey ain been able fa git weh e been, cause sommuch people been dey.
Somebody tell Jedus say, “Ya modda an ya broda dem da stan outside de house. Dey wahn fa see ya.”
Jedus ansa um say, “Dem wa yeh God wod an do wa e say, dem me modda an me broda dem.”
One day, Jedus tell e ciple dem say, “Leh we go cross ta de oda side de lake.” So dey git eenta a boat an cyas off.
Wiles dey beena sail, Jedus drop da sleep een de boat. Jes den, a big wind come an blow oba de lake. E mek de wata come een de boat til e mos sink. Dey been een a fix.
De ciple dem gone an wake Jedus op. Dey holla say, “Massa, Massa, we all gwine git drown!” Jedus wake op. E buke de big wind an de swellin wata. E tell um fa stan still. Dat big wind stop blow jes den, an de swellin wata gone down. Ebryting calm right down.
Jedus tell e ciple dem say, “Hoccome oona ain got no fait een me?” Dey been stonish an scaid. Dey aks one noda say, “Who dis man yah? E da chaage eben de wind an de wata, tell um wa fa do, an dey do um!”
Jedus an e ciple dem sail een de boat, cross oba ta de arie weh de Gadarene people lib. Dis been ta de oda side ob de lake fom Galilee.
Wen dey git dey, Jedus git outta de boat. An same time, a man fom de town come meet um. Dis man hab some ebil sperit dat beena lib eenside um fa a long time. E been nekid, an e ain stay een no house. E beena stay een de grabeyaad.
Wen de man see Jedus, e holla loud an git down pon de groun fo Jedus foot. E holla say, “Jedus, ya de Son ob de Mos High God! Wa bidness ya got wid me? A da beg ya, do please, dohn toment me!”
De man taak so, cause Jedus done chaage de ebil sperit wa been eenside de man fa lef um. Plenty time de sperit beena tek hole ta de man an mek um ron way ta de desat. Eben dough people tie e han an e foot wid iron chain an gyaad um, ebry time e buss de chain an de ebil sperit mek um ron way.
Jedus aks um say, “Wa ya name?” E ansa um, “A name ‘Plenty.’ ” E say dat cause plenty ebil sperit been dey eenside um.
Dem ebil sperit beena beg Jedus oba an oba say, “Do, dohn sen we ta dat deep hole wa ain got no bottom.”
Same time, a heapa hog beena nyam pon a hill dey. So de ebil sperit beg Jedus say, “Leh we go eenside de hog dem.” An Jedus leh um.
Wen de ebil sperit dem come outta de man an gone eenta de hog dem, all de hog dem ron down de side ob de steep hill like sompin wile. Dey ron eenta de lake an git drown.
Wen de people wa beena mind de hog dem see wa happen, dey mek hace an gone ta de town an ta de whole arie an tell people de nyews.
Den de people gone fa see wa been happen. Dey come ta Jedus, an dey see de man wa de ebil sperit dem been come outta, da seddown ta Jedus foot, da listen ta um. E hab on cloes an e been een e right mind. Wen de people see dat, dey been scaid.
Dem people wa been dey wen Jedus dribe out de ebil sperit dem fom eenside dat man, dey tell de oda people how Jedus been heal de man.
Den all dem fom dat arie weh da Gadarene people lib been scaid down. Dey aks Jedus fa go way fom dey. So den, Jedus git eenta de boat an gone back ta de place weh e come fom.
Bot wiles Jedus still dey, de man wa been hab de ebil sperit dem, e beg Jedus say, “Leh me go long wid ya.” Bot Jedus ain leh um go wid um.
Jedus tell de man say, “Mus go back home an tell de people bout de great ting God done fa ya.” So de man gone all oba town, da tell ebrybody bout de great ting wa Jedus done fa um.
Wen Jedus git ta de oda side ob de lake gin, de people glad fa shim, an dey come meet um. Dey all beena wait fa um.
Den one man wa been leada een de Jew meetin house, e come. E name Jairus, an e come git down ta Jedus foot. E beg um say, “Do please, come ta me house wid me.”
Cause Jairus onliest daughta been mos dead. De gyal been bout tweb yeah ole. Jedus gone wid Jairus. Same time Jedus beena gwine, sommuch people gone wid um, dey beena push ginst um pon ebry side.
One ooman been dey wa been sick tweb yeah. All dat time e beena bleed. E done pay docta all e money an ting, bot ain nobody been able fa hep um.
Dat ooman ketch op wid Jedus, come hine um, an e tetch de edge ob Jedus cloes. De same time e tetch um, e git heal. De bleedin stop, Bam!
Jedus aks de people say, “Who dat done tetch me?” Ebrybody tell um say, “A ain tetch ya.” Den Peter an dem wa been long wid um say, “Massa, all de crowd yah roun ya da push ginst ya. Wa mek ya aks who dat tetch ya?”
Bot Jedus say, “Somebody done tetch me. A know, cause powa done gone outta me.”
De ooman wa tetch Jedus cloes find out dat e ain able fa hide. E staat fa tremble, an e come git down pon de groun ta Jedus foot. Fo all de people, dat ooman tell Jedus hoccome e been tetch um, an how dat same time wen e tetch um, e done git heal.
Jedus tell de ooman say, “Me daughta, cause ya bleebe, ya done git heal. Ya kin go wid peace een ya haat.”
Wiles Jedus beena taak, a man come fom Jairus house, tell Jairus say, “Ya daughta done dead. Ya ain need fa bodda de Teacha no mo.”
Jedus yeh um say de chile done dead, an e tell Jairus say, “Mus dohn feah. Jes bleebe an ya chile gwine lib gin. E gwine be heal.” An dey gone long ta Jairus house.
Wen dey git ta de house, Jedus ain leh nobody go een wid um cep Peter, John, James, an de chile fada an e modda.
Ebrybody beena weep an wail fa de chile. Jedus tell um say, “Mus dohn weep, cause e ain dead. E da sleep!”
De people dem laugh at um, cause dey know de chile dead fa true.
Bot Jedus tek de chile han an call um say, “Chile, git op!”
Life come back eenta de chile, an jes den e git op. Den Jedus tell um fa gii de chile sompin fa nyam.
De chile modda an e fada been stonish. Bot Jedus chaage um mus dohn tell nobody wa been happen.
Jedus call e tweb ciple dem, an e gim powa an tority fa dribe out all de ebil sperit dem an fa heal dem wa sick.
Den e sen um fa go all roun fa tell bout how God da rule, an fa mek de sick people well.
Fo dey gone, Jedus tell um say, “Wen oona da trabel so, mus dohn tote nottin long wid ya. Mus dohn cyaa no stick fa waak, needa no bag fa cyaa ting een, needa no bread an no money. Dohn eben cyaa no extry shat.
Wen ya go een somebody house an dey gree fa leh ya stay dey, ya mus stay wid dem til ya ready fa lef dat town.
Ef ya go ta a town an de people ain heppy fa hab ya stay dey, mus lef dat town. Wiles ya da gwine, mus shake de dort fom off ya foot fa leh um know God ain please wid de way dey done an e gwine hole dat ginst um.”
Den de ciple dem lef Jedus, an dey gone fom settlement ta settlement, da tell ebrybody de Good Nyews an heal people ebryweh.
Herod wa beena rule een Galilee yeh bout all wa happen. E been all mix op een e head, cause some ob de people beena taak say dat John wa Bactize wa done come back fom de dead.
An some people beena say dat de prophet Elijah come back. Oda people say dat one ob dem prophet fom way back done come back fom de dead.
Herod say, “A done hab John head cut off. Bot who dis yah A da yeh susha ting bout?” So e beena try fa see Jedus.
Wen de postle dem come back, dey tell Jedus all wa dey done done. Jedus tek um an gone way fom de oda people. Dey gone ta a town name Bethsaida.
Wen de crowd yeh say Jedus gone ta Bethsaida, dey gone folla um dey. Jedus glad fa shim. E tell um bout how God da rule, an e heal dem wa been need fa be heal.
Wen e been mos fus daak, de tweb ciple dem come ta Jedus say, “Nobody ain lib ta dis place yah. Mus sen way de crowd. Mek um go ta some ob de settlement an faam dem roun bout yah an find sompin fa nyam an a place fa stay.”
Jedus tell um say, “Oona mus gim sompin fa nyam.” Dey ansa um, “We ain got nottin bot fibe loaf ob bread an two fish. We ain able fa go buy sompin fa all dem people yah, ainty?”
Bout fibe tousan man been dey. Jedus tell e ciple dem say, “Mek de people all seddown, an wide um op, bout fifty head een ebry bunch.”
De ciple dem mek de people all seddown like how Jedus tell um fa do.
Jedus tek de fibe loaf ob bread an de two fish. E look op ta heaben an e tell God, “Tankya fa de bread an de fish.” Den e broke de bread an de fish an gim ta e ciple dem fa saab de crowd.
Ebrybody nyam til dey been sattify. An de ciple dem geda tweb basket ob lef oba bread an fish.
One day Jedus been ta esef an e beena pray. Wen e ciple dem come jine um, e aks um say, “Who de people say A da?”
Dey ansa um say, “Some people say ya John wa Bactize. Oda people say ya Elijah. An some say ya one dem prophet fom way back wa done come back fom de dead.”
Den Jedus aks e ciple dem say, “Well den, who oona say A da?” Peter tell um say, “Ya de Messiah.”
Jedus gii e ciple dem scrick orda say, “Mus dohn tell nobody who A da.”
E tell um, “De Man wa Come fom God haffa suffa a whole heap. Dem Jew head leada an de leada dem ob de priest dem an de Law teacha dem ain gwine hab nottin fa do wid um. De people gwine kill um, bot atta shree day e gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin.”
Jedus tell um all say, “Ef a poson wahn fa come wid me, e mus dohn do jes wa e wahn fa do no mo. E haffa tote e cross an folla me ebry day.
De poson wa da try fa sabe e life, e gwine loss e true life. Bot de poson wa loss e life cause ob me, e gwine git de true life.
Wa good e do a man ef e git ebryting een de whole wol an e gone ta hell wen e dead? E done loss e true life, ainty?
Ef anybody da shame ob me an wa A done laan um, de Man wa Come fom God gwine be shame ob dat poson wen e come like a king. E gwine come wid great powa an light wa come out fom heaben an shine pon um. Dat de same light wa da shine pon me Fada God an pon God angel dem wa gwine come wid um.
A da tell oona fa true, some ob dem wa da stanop yah now, dey ain gwine dead til dey done see God da rule oba de wol, a king fa true.”
Wen bout eight day done pass atta e say dat, Jedus call Peter, John, an James fa go long wid um. Dey gone pontop a high hill fa pray.
Wiles Jedus beena pray, e face change. E cloes change too. Dey ton pure white an beena shine like shaap lightnin.
All ob a sudden two man appeah, da taak wid Jedus. Dem man been Moses an Elijah,
an a bright light beena shine all roun um. Dey beena taak wid Jedus bout wen e gwine haffa dead een Jerusalem fa finish wa God done plan.
Peter dem been een a haad sleep. Bot dey wake op an see dat bright light roun Jedus an de two man dem wa beena stan wid um.
Wen Moses an Elijah staat fa lef Jedus, Peter tell Jedus say, “Massa, e a good ting we yah! Leh we mek shree bush aaba, one fa ya, one fa Moses, an one fa Elijah.” Bot Peter ain beena ondastan wa e beena taak bout.
Wiles Peter beena taak, a cloud come an cyas a shada oba um. Wen de cloud kiba um, de ciple dem been scaid.
Dey yeh a boice wa come outta de cloud. An e tell um say, “Dis me Son, wa A lob a whole heap. Mus listen ta wa e tell oona!”
Wen de boice git shru, ain nobody been dey cep Jedus. Atta dat, de ciple dem ain crack dey teet bout wa dey been see dat day. Dey ain tell nobody jurin dat time.
De day atta dat, wen Jedus dem come down fom de hill, a whole crowd ob people come fa meet Jedus.
One man een de crowd holla, “Teacha, A da beg ya! Do please, come look at me son, cause e de onliest chile A got.
A ebil sperit tek hole ta um. Dat sperit mek um holla all ob a sudden. E ketch fits, an e da foam out de mout. De sperit keep on da bruise um op. Ain haadly eba lef um off.
A beena beg ya ciple dem fa dribe dat sperit out, bot dey ain been able fa do um.”
Jedus mek ansa say, “Oona people yah wa lib een dis time ain got no fait! Oona ain ondastan nottin. Hommuch mo longa A gwine haffa pit op wid oona?” Den e tell de man say, “Bring ya son yah.”
Wiles de boy beena come ta Jedus, de ebil sperit shrow um down ta de groun wid fits. Bot Jedus gii orda ta dat ebil sperit fa come outta de boy, an de boy been heal. Den Jedus gim back ta e fada.
All de people been stonish fa see de great powa ob God. Ebrybody beena wonda at all de ting dem wa Jedus beena do. An e taak ta e ciple dem.
E tell um say, “A wahn oona fa listen good ta wa A gwine tell oona. Dey gwine han um oba. Dey gwine ton de Man wa Come fom God een ta dem wa een chaage yah.”
De ciple dem ain ondastan wa Jedus mean. Cause God done hide de meanin fom um, so dey ain know yet wa been gwine happen. Dey been scaid fa aks Jedus wa e mean wen e say dat.
De ciple dem staat fa aagy bout wish one dem been gwine be great de mos.
Jedus know wa dey beena tink, so e tek a leetle chile an stan um op by e side.
E tell e ciple dem say, “Anybody wa tek een a leetle chile like dis one yah een me name, dat poson done tek me een. An anybody wa tek me een, e done tek een de one wa sen me. De poson wa tink e ain nottin mongst oona, e de one wa sompin fa sho.”
John tell Jedus say, “Massa, we done see one man da dribe out ebil sperit by de powa ob ya name. We tell um fa stop dat, cause dat man ain one ob we.”
Jedus say, “Mus dohn tell de man fa stop, cause ef anybody ain ginst oona, e fa oona.”
Wen de time mos come wa God done set fa tek Jedus op ta heaben, Jedus set e mind fa go ta Jerusalem.
E sen messenja dem fa go head ob um fo e staat off. De messenja dem gone een a Samaria settlement fa git ebryting ready fa Jedus.
Bot de people een dat settlement ain wahn Jedus fa stop dey, cause dey been know e done set e mind fa go on ta Jerusalem.
Wen James an John, e ciple dem, see dat de people een dat settlement ain wahn Jedus fa stop dey, dey aks Jedus say, “Lawd, ya wahn we fa aks God fa sen fire down fom heaben fa bun op dem people?”
Jedus ton roun ta James an John an e buke um.
[E say, “Oona ain know wa kind ob sperit dey een oona haat. Cause de Man wa Come fom God ain come fa tek way people life. E come fa sabe um.”] Den Jedus an e ciple dem gone long ta noda settlement.
Wiles Jedus an e ciple dem gone long de road, one man tell Jedus say, “A gwine folla ya wehsoneba ya go.”
Jedus ansa um say, “De fox got hole een de groun, an de bod wa fly roun op een de air dey got nes. Bot de Man wa Come fom God ain got noweh fa lay e head.”
Jedus tell noda man say, “Come folla me!” Bot de man ansa um say, “Sah, fus leh me go an bury me fada.”
Jedus ansa, “Leh dem wa dead bury dey own dead. Bot ya yasef go, tell oda people bout God rule.”
An noda man tell Jedus say, “Sah, A gwine folla ya, bot fus leh me go tell me fambly A da gwine.”
Jedus ansa um say, “De poson wa staat fa plow groun an e keep on da look back hine um, e ain fit fa lib onda God rule.”
Atta dis, de Lawd pick sebenty oda man. E sen um out two by two fa go eenta ebry town an settlement weh Jedus esef been bout fa go.
Fo de man dem gone, Jedus tell um say, “De crop done ready fa haabis, bot dey ain nuff han fa geda um. Mus pray ta de Lawd ob de crop fa sen out mo han fa geda de crop.
Now go! A da sen oona out jes like lamb mongst wolf.
Wiles oona gwine long so, mus dohn cyaa no money. Mus dohn cyaa no bag or no shoe. Mus dohn waste time da taak wid people long de road.
Wasoneba house ya go een, mus fus say, ‘God bless all oona een dis house.’
Ef dey a peaceable poson dey, e gwine hab de blessin dat ya done pray fa um fa git. Bot ef dey ain no peaceable poson dey, dat blessin wa ya done gim gwine come back ta ya.
De fus house weh ya gone een, weh dey gree fa leh ya stay, mus stay een dat house all de time ya dey een dat place. Mus nyam an drink wasoneba dey gii ya, cause ebrybody wa wok oughta git pay. Mus dohn moob fom one house ta noda.
Wensoneba ya go een a town an de people glad ya come, ya mus nyam wasoneba dey gii ya.
Mus heal de sick een dat town, an mus tell de people dey, say, ‘Time fa God fa rule oba oona da come.’
Wensoneba ya go een a town an de people ain glad ya come, mus go out een de screet an taak ta um.
Tell um say, ‘We da shake off eben de dort ob oona town fom off we foot fa waan ya dat ya done bad. De time da come wen God gwine rule oba oona.’ ”
Jedus say, “A da tell oona fa true, wen de Jedgiment Day come, dem een dat town gwine suffa mo den de people ob Sodom!”
Jedus say, “E gwine be a haad time fa oona wa lib een Chorazin an een Bethsaida. Cause ef de people wa lib een Tyre an Sidon been see dem miracle wa A beena do fa oona, dey been gwine change dey sinful way. Dey been gwine weah croka sack an rub ashesh pon dey head an seddown fa leh ebrybody know dey done change dey way!
Wen de Jedgiment Day come an God da jedge all de people een de wol, oona gwine suffa mo den dem people een Tyre an Sidon!
Oona wa lib dey een Capernaum, oona tink say, oona gwine git lif op ta heaben, ainty? No! Oona gwine git chunk down ta hell!”
Jedus tell e ciple dem say, “Anybody wa pay oona mind, dat poson da pay me mind. Anybody wa ton way fom oona, e done ton way fom me. An anybody wa ton way fom me, e done ton way fom de one wa sen me.”
Den de sebenty man dem come back ta Jedus. Dey been full op wid joy, an dey tell um say, “Lawd, eben de ebil sperit dem pay we mind wen we nyuse ya name!”
Jedus ansa um say, “A done see Satan faddown, come outta heaben like lightnin.
Fa true, A done gii oona powa oba de enemy an all de powa e got. Ef oona waak pon snake an scorpion, dey ain gwine hut oona. Nottin ain gwine hut oona.
Stillyet, mus dohn be so glad cause de ebil sperit dem pay oona mind. Mus be glad cause oona name done been write down een heaben.”
Dat same time, de Holy Sperit full Jedus op wid joy. Jedus say, “Fada, ya de Lawd. Ya da rule heaben an ya da rule dis wol! A tank ya cause ya done show dese ting ta dem wa ain hab no laanin. An ya done hide dese ting fom dem wa tink say, dey wise an hab plenty laanin. Yeah, Fada, e been ya good pledja fa do um like dis.”
Jedus tell de people say, “Me Fada done gii me powa oba ebryting. Nobody ain know who de Son da, cep fa de Fada. An ain nobody know who de Fada da, cep fa de Son an dem wa de Son pick fa mek um know de Fada.”
Jedus ton ta e ciple dem. E tell jes dem say, “Fa true, oona been bless cause ob wa oona da see!
A da tell oona, plenty prophet an king done been wahn fa see dem ting wa oona da see, bot dey ain shim. Dey wahn fa yeh wa oona da yeh, bot dey ain yeh um.”
One Jew Law teacha come op fa test Jedus. E aks Jedus say, “Teacha, wa A haffa do fa git life wa las faeba?”
Jedus aks um say, “Wa ting dey write down een de Jew Law Book? How ya tapetate wa e say?”
De Law teacha ansa Jedus say, “De Law say, ‘Mus lob de Lawd ya God wid all ya haat an wid all ya soul. Mus lob um wid all ya scrent an wid all ya mind. An mus lob ya neighba de same way ya lob yasef.’ ”
Jedus say, “Ya ansa right, fa true. Ef ya do dem ting, ya gwine lib faeba.”
De Law teacha been wahn fa sho Jedus e right fa taak wa e taak, so e aks Jedus say, “Who dat me neighba?”
Jedus ansa um say, “One time a man beena gwine down fom Jerusalem ta Jericho. Wiles e beena gwine, some robba layway um. Dey gang um an scrip off e cloes. Den dey beat um op til e been mos dead. An dey gone an lef um dey een de road.
A Jew priest come down de road. Wen e see de man pon de groun dey, e cross oba ta de oda side ob de road an gone.
Same fashion, a Levite, a Law teacha, come ta de place weh de man been een de road. Wen de Levite git dey an shim, e cross oba ta de oda side ob de road an gone too.
Bot one scranja wa come fom Samaria beena trabel long dat road. Wen e git dey an e see de man wa de robba beat op, e feel too saary fa um.
E gone oba ta de man. E pour medicine, oll an wine, een de cut weh de robba done beat um op. E wrop op de cut. Den e pit de man pon e own mule, cyaa um ta a bodin house. An e stay dey wid um an nuss um.
Nex day wen de man fom Samaria git ready fa go, e call de man wa ron de bodin house. E gim money, two silba coin, an e tell um say, ‘Mus tek cyah ob dis man fa me. Wasoneba mo e cost, A gwine pay ya wen A git back.’ ”
“Now den,” Jedus aks de Law teacha, say, “Wa ya tink? Wish one dem shree man show e been a neighba ta de man wa git rob?”
De Law teacha ansa Jedus say, “De scranja fom Samaria, de one wa hab mussy pon de man wa been rob.” Jedus tell um say, “Mus go an do de same.”
Jedus an e ciple dem trabel long. Dey gone ta a settlement weh a ooman name Martha beena lib. E welcome Jedus an eenbite um fa come een de house.
Martha hab sista name Mary, an Mary gone seddown close by Jedus foot fa yeh wa ting Jedus gwine laan um.
Bot Martha beena ton roun, da fix sompin fa nyam an da git de house ready fa saab de compny. E gone ta Jedus an tell um say, “Lawd, ya ain saary fa me? Me sista lef me by mesef. E ain hep me git nottin ready. Tell um fa come hep me!”
Jedus ansa um, “Martha, Martha, ya opsot an bodda bout tommuch ting.
Ya ain need bot one ting. Ya see Mary da seddown yah an A da laan um. Mary done pick de good ting, an ain nobody gwine tek um fom um.”
One day Jedus beena pray dey een one place. Wen e git shru da pray, one e ciple dem tell um say, “Lawd, laan we how fa pray, jes like John laan e ciple dem.”
Jedus tell um say, “Wen oona pray, mus say, ‘We Fada [wa dey een heaben,] leh ebrybody hona ya name. We pray dat soon ya gwine rule oba de wol. [Wasoneba ting ya wahn, leh um be so een dis wol, same like dey een heaben.]
Gii we de food wa we need dis day yah an ebry day.
Fagib we fa we sin, cause we da fagib dem people wa do bad ta we. Leh we dohn hab haad test wen Satan try we. [Keep we fom ebil.]’ ”
Jedus tell e ciple dem say, “Sposin one ob oona hab a good fren, an ya gone ta e house een de middle ob de night. Ya call um say, ‘Fren, do lend me shree loaf ob bread.
A got a fren wa beena trabel an e done come by fa wisit me. A ain got nottin fa gim fa nyam.’
Den e gwine ansa ya fom een de house an say, ‘Mus dohn bodda me. A done lock de door, an me an me chullun done lay down een de bed fa de night. A ain able fa git op an gii ya nottin.’ Sposin dat how e stan?
A da tell ya, eben ef ya fren ain git op an gii ya nottin cause e ya fren, ef ya ain shame fa keep on da aks um, e gwine git op an e gwine gii ya wa ya need, cause ya ain shame fa keep on da aks um.
A da tell oona say, aks God an e gwine gii ya wa ya aks fa. Look ta God, an ya gwine find wasoneba ya da look fa. Knock ta God door, an e gwine open um ta ya.
Cause de poson wa aks, God gwine gim wa e aks fa. De poson wa look ta God, e gwine find wasoneba e da look fa. An de poson wa knock ta God door, God gwine open de door ta um.
Oona wa fada, ef ya son aks ya say, ‘Fada, gii me a piece ob bread,’ ya ain gwine gim no rock, ainty? An ef ya son aks ya fa a piece ob fish, ya ain gwine gim no snake, ainty?
An ef ya son aks ya fa a egg, fa sho ya ain gwine gim no scorpion!
Ef oona wa ebil know how fa gii oona chullun good ting, oona Fada een heaben know mo den dat how fa gii de Holy Sperit ta dem wa aks um!”
Jedus beena dribe out a ebil sperit fom a man. Cause ob dat sperit, de man ain been able fa taak. Wen Jedus mek de ebil sperit come outta dat man, de man staat fa taak. All de people been stonish.
Bot some dem people say, “Dat de debil Beelzebub, de leada ob de ebil sperit dem, wa da gii Jedus de powa fa dribe um out.”
Oda people try fa test Jedus. Dey tell um say, “Mus do one dem miracle fa sho we dat ya hab God powa fa true.”
Jedus know wa dem people beena tink, so e tell um say, “Ef de people een a country da fight ginst one noda, dat country ain gwine las. Same way so, ef a fambly da fight mongst deysef, dat fambly gwine paat.
An ef dem wa wok fa Satan fight mongst deysef, Satan rule ain gwine las, ainty? A da say dat cause oona say, ‘Beelzebub, de head leada ob de ebil sperit dem, e da gii me de powa fa dribe out de ebil sperit.’
Ef Beelzebub da gii me de powa fa dribe ebil sperit, who dat gii oona people de powa fa dribe um out? No! Dem ting wa oona people deysef da do, dey show oona ain right.
God esef da gii me de powa fa dribe out ebil sperit, an dat show fa true dat God done staat fa rule mongst oona.
“Wen a scrong man hab all e weapon ready an e da gyaad e house, den ain nobody gwine tief e ting dem.
Bot wen a man wa mo scronga come ginst dat man an beat um op, de one wa beat um op gwine tek all e weapon. E gwine tek way all de ting dem wa dat man hab fa hep um fight, cyaa um way, an wide um op wid dem wa trabel long wid um.
“Now anybody wa ain fa me, e ginst me. An anybody wa ain hep me fa geda people, bring dem ta me, e da scatta um.
“Wen ebil sperit done come outta a man, e da trabel shru dry place fa find a place fa res. Ef e ain able fa find no place, e say ta esef, ‘A gwine back eenside de house weh A been.’
Wen dat ebil sperit come back eenside de man, e find um jes like a house wa clean an scraighten op.
Den de ebil sperit gone an git seben oda sperit way mo ebil den esef. Dey all come fa lib eenside dat man. Now dat man een a wossa shape den e been.”
Wen Jedus say dis, a ooman een de crowd tell um say, “Dat sho a bless ooman wa bon ya an nuss ya!”
Jedus ansa um say, “Yeh, dat true, bot de one wa bless fa true, e de one wa yeh God wod an do wa God tell um fa do!”
Mo an mo people beena crowd op roun Jedus, an e taak ta um. E say, “De people wa lib now, dey wickity. Dey da aks me fa sho um a sign, bot A ain gwine do um. Dey ain gwine see no sign cep de sign ob de prophet Jonah.
Jes like Jonah been a sign ta de people een Ninevah, same way so, de Man wa Come fom God gwine be a sign fa dem people wa da lib now.
Wen Jedgiment Day come, de queen wa nyuse fa rule een de sout, e gwine stanop an taak ginst de people wa da lib now. Cause e been trabel haf way roun de wol fom e country clean ta weh Solomon been. E gone dey fa yeh de wise wod wa Solomon say. Bot look yah, somebody way mo den Solomon dey yah now.
Wen Jedgiment Day come, de people wa nyuse fa lib een Ninevah, dey gwine taak ginst dem people wa da lib now. Cause wen de people ob Ninevah done yeh wa de ole people prophet Jonah say, dey change dey sinful way an ain do um no mo. An look yah, somebody way mo den Jonah dey yah now!”
Jedus say, “Ain nobody gwine light a lamp an den hide um someweh weh dey cyahn shim. Needa e ain gwine pit de lamp ondaneet a bushel basket. E gwine pit de lamp pontop ob a table so dem wa come een de house kin see de light.
Ya eye like a lamp fa ya body. Ef ya got good eye, all ya body full op wid light. Bot ef ya eye ain no good, all ya body gwine be een de daak.
Mus mek sho ya hab light steada daak een ya.
Ef all ya body full op wid light an e ain hab no daak paat een um, dat light wa dey een ya gwine shine all oba, jes like a bright lamp wa da shine pon ya.”
Wen Jedus git shru da taak, one de Pharisee dem eenbite um fa come nyam ta e house. So Jedus gone an seddown fa nyam.
De Pharisee been stonish wen e see dat Jedus done seddown fa nyam an e ain wash e han same way de Pharisee dem beena wash dey han.
De Lawd tell um say, “Oona Pharisee da wash de outside ob oona cup an plate, bot eenside oona haat, oona full op wid wickity an ebil ting.
Oona ain got a bit ob sense! God mek de outside an de eenside all two, ainty?
Mus gii de food wa eenside oona cup an oona plate ta dem wa ain got nottin, an ebryting oona hab gwine be clean fa oona.”
Jedus tell um say, “E gwine be a haad time fa oona Pharisee! Oona gii God a tent ob all de crop an ting oona git, eben de leetle mint an rue an oda herb wa oona raise fa season oona food. Stillyet, oona ain do right ta people, an oona ain lob God. Fa true, dese ting oona mus do. An oona mus dohn lef off dem oda ting wa oona spose fa do.
“E gwine be a haad time fa oona Pharisee! Cause oona lob fa seddown een de bes seat een de Jew meetin house so people kin see oona. An wen oona een de maakut, oona lob fa dem fa hail oona fa sho ebrybody dat oona sompin special.
E gwine be a haad time fa oona Pharisee! Cause oona jes like grabe wa ain got no stone fa maak um. People ain see dem grabe, so dey waak pontop ob um. An wen dey do dat, dey ain eben know wa dey da do.”
One ob de Jew Law teacha dem ansa Jedus say, “Teacha, wen ya da taak like dat, ya hole we cheap too.”
Jedus ansa um say, “E gwine be a haad time fa oona wa teach de Jew Law! Cause oona da tapetate de Law so scrick an add sommuch ting ta um, oona mek um hebby load fa tote. Bot oonasef ain pit eben one finga fa hep dem tote dat load. Oona say dey mus lib coddin ta dem whole heapa law, bot oona ain do nottin fa hep mek um easy.
E gwine be a haad time fa oona! Oona build fine tomb fa memba de prophet dem. Dem de same prophet dat oona ole people done kill.
So den, oona da show oona bleebe oona ole people done do right. Cause dey kill de prophet dem an oona build fine tomb fa memba dem prophet.
Cause ob dat, God wise wod tell we say, ‘A gwine sen me prophet dem an me messenja dem ta um. Bot dey gwine kill some ob dem, an dey gwine mek some de oda res suffa.’
So God gwine hole oona people yah wa lib now sponsable fa ebry one ob dem prophet wa oona ole people done kill eba since God mek de wol.
God gwine hole oona sponsable fa de prophet dem wa de ole people done kill, fom Abel all de way ta Zechariah, wa dey done kill dey tween God House an de alta weh dey mek sacrifice ta God. Fa true, A da tell oona, God gwine hole oona people sponsable wa lib now fa all dem wa oona ole people kill!
