“E gwine be a haad time fa oona Law teacha! Cause oona done lock op de wod ob God, de onliest place weh people kin go fa laan fa true. An oona done tek de key so dey cyahn go een. Oona ain gone eenside an try fa laan, an oona da stop de oda people dem wa da try fa gone een fa laan!”
Jedus staat fa go way fom dey, an de Law teacha an de Pharisee dem staat fa cuse um tommuch an aks um queshon bout a whole heapa ting.
Dey beena try fa mek Jedus taak ginst Moses Law, eeda ginst God name, so dey kin bring chaage ginst um, say e done wrong.
Same time, a whole heapa people come fa yeh Jedus. Dey beena crowd op togeda so, til dey beena step pontop one noda. Fus Jedus laan e ciple dem. E tell um say, “Mus dohn be no hypicrit like dem Pharisee. Mus dohn fool op wid dem hypicrit, wa stan like yeast mix op een flour. E all kiba op an e da spread all oba eenside de flour.
Wasoneba kiba op gwine be onkiba. Wasoneba people do een secret, ebrybody gwine know bout um.
Wasoneba oona beena taak bout een de daak ob de night, people gwine yeh ebryting oona done say. Dey gwine yeh um een de broad day light. Wasoneba oona beena taak bout ondaneet oona bret eenside a room een de house, oona gwine yeh ebrybody da holla um, da tote de nyews outside een de screet.
“Me fren, A tell oona, mus dohn be scaid ob people wa able fa stroy oona body, cause dey ain able fa do no mo den dat. Dey cyahn do nottin tall bout oona soul. So mus dohn be scaid ob dem people.
A gwine leh oona know head ob time who dat oona mus be scaid ob. Mus feah God. Cause wen e done mek somebody dead, e hab powa fa punish um atta dat, fa chunk dat poson soul eenta hell. Yeah, fa true, oona mus feah God!
“De sparra wot leetle or nottin. Fibe ob dem cost bout two cent, ainty? Eben so, God dohn neba fagit bout none ob dem sparra, none tall.
Oona way mo walyable den a whole heapa sparra. De Lawd God done count ebry scran ob hair pon oona head, an e know eben hommuch hair oona got. So den, mus dohn be scaid ob people. God da tek cyah ob oona!”
Jedus tell um say, “Fa true, anybody wa tell people dat e blongst ta me, de Man wa Come fom God gwine tell God angel dem say, ‘Dat poson dey blongst ta me.’
Bot anybody wa tell people say, e ain blongst ta me, A gwine tell God angel dem say, ‘Dat one dey ain blongst ta me!’
“De poson wa taak ginst de Man wa Come fom God, God kin fagib um, bot de poson wa say ebil ting ginst de Holy Sperit, God ain neba gwine fagib um.
“Wen dey ketch oona fa jedge oona een de Jew meetin house, an dey cyaa oona een front ob de leada dem an tority dem, mus dohn fret bout how oona gwine ansa dem, or wa ting oona gwine say.
Cause dat same time, de Holy Sperit gwine tell oona wa ting oona spose fa say.”
One man dey een de crowd tell Jedus say, “Teacha, me fada done dead. A wahn ya fa tell me broda fa wide wid me de propaty we fada lef fa we.”
Jedus ansa de man say, “Look yah, man, ain nobody sen me fa be no jedge, needa fa be de one fa wide op propaty tween oona.”
Den Jedus tell all de people say, “A da tell oona head ob time, mus dohn hab de big eye bout nottin. Cause we true life ain medja by de ting dem we got, eben ef we got a whole heapa ting.”
Den Jedus tell um a paable, say, “One time, one man hab a heapa ting. E hab faam wa mek good crop.
E study e head, e tink say, ‘Wa A gwine do? A hab sommuch crop, A ain hab no place fa pit all ob um.’
E tink say, ‘A know wa fa do. A gwine teah down me ole baan an build um mo bigga. A gwine pit all me grain an ting een dey.
Wen A done do dat, A gwine tell mesef say, ya got plenty ting pit back, all de good ting dem ya gwine need fa plenty yeah fa come. Now den, ya ain need fa warry bout nottin. Mus jes nyam an drink an pledja yasef!’
God tell de man say, ‘Ya fool! Dis night yah, A gwine tek ya life. Den who gwine git all dem ting yah dat ya beena pit back, fa keep fa yasef?’
“Dat how e stan fa de people wa jes da pile op plenty ting fa deysef. Dey sho ain rich een de ting dem dat count fa true wid God.”
Jedus tell e ciple dem say, “So den, A da tell oona say, mus dohn warry bout how ya gwine lib, wa ya gwine nyam, needa wa cloes ya gwine weah pon ya body.
Cause ya life walyable way mo den sompin fa nyam, an ya body walyable way mo den cloes.
Now den, leh we study bout dem crow. Dey ain plant no seed, needa geda crop. Dey ain hab no conehouse, needa no baan fa keep wa dey geda. Stillyet, God da feed um! Oona way mo walyable den de bod!
An fa true, ain nary one ob oona kin grow a bit talla cause e da warry bout um, ainty?
Ef ya ain able fa do leetle ting like dat, hoccome ya da warry bout de oda res?
An leh we study bout de lily wa da grow wile. Dey ain wok, needa mek cloes fa deysef. Now, A da tell oona, King Solomon been too rich, an e hab fine cloes. Stillyet, eben Solomon ain neba hab cloes fa dress purty an fine like dem lily wa da grow wile.
God de one dat gii cloes ta de wile grass, mek um purty an fine. An dat grass dey taday, an e gone demarra. People cut um down an nyuse um fa mek fire een dey oben. Ef God dress op de wile grass like dat, fa true e gwine do way mo den dat fa mek sho oona hab cloes fa weah. Sho nuff oona ain bleebe God wid all oona haat!
Mus dohn fret yasef bout wa ya gwine nyam an wa ya gwine drink. Mus dohn warry bout um tall.
De people dat ain bleebe pon God, dey da warry all de time bout dem ting. Bot God oona Fada, an e know oona haffa hab sompin fa nyam an drink an cloes fa weah.
Steada dat, ya mus study bout how fa leh God rule een ya life. Den God gwine gii ya all dem oda ting too.”
“A de shephud, an oona me leetle flock. Oona ain a whole heap, bot mus dohn fret. Cause God oona Fada, e glad fa mek oona rule wid esef.
Oona mus sell ebryting wa oona hab an gii ta de people wa ain got nottin. Dat how ya gwine git God good ting fa oonasef. Like money wa dohn neba ron out, ya gwine hab ya tredja een heaben, weh e gwine stan faeba. Cause tief ain able fa tief um dey, an no mot kin stroy um.
Cause wehsoneba ya tredja da, dat weh ya haat gwine be too.
“Ya mus fix ya cloes so ya ready fa wok. Mus light ya lamp, an mus dohn leh um go out.
Oona mus stan like a wokman wa da wait fa de man e da wok fa fa come back fom a marry feas. E da wait so dat wensoneba e massa come home an knock, e ready an kin open de door fa um.
Dem wokman gwine be bless fa true dat ready an ain sleep wen de man dey wok fa come home! A da tell oona fa true, de man dey wok fa gwine fix e cloes so e ready fa wok, an e gwine call e wokman dem, mek um come seddown ta de table. E gwine saab um, gim sompin fa nyam.
Dem wokman gwine be bless fa true. Dey gwine be bless eben ef de man dey wok fa come een de middle ob de night, or ef e come jes fo de roosta crow. Dey gwine be bless ef e find um ready!
Oona mus know dat ef de man wa own a house been know wen de tief gwine come ta um, dat man ain gwine sleep. E ain gwine lef e house. E gwine stay dey, an de tief ain gwine broke een an go eenside.
Same fashion, oona too mus be ready all de time. Cause de Man wa Come fom God gwine come back ta dis wol wen oona da tink say, ‘E ain da come now.’ ”
Peter aks Jedus say, “Lawd, dis paable dat ya jes tell, ya tell dat fa we or fa all de people?”
De Lawd ansa say, “Who dat wokman wa got plenty sense an wa true ta de man e da wok fa? E de one dat de bossman gwine gii chaage oba all dem een e house wen de bossman gwine off. De bossman chaage dat wokman fa sho de oda wokman dem all de ting dem dey fa do. An dat wokman een chaage gwine wide op de food fa dem fa nyam wen e spose.
Dat wokman gwine be bless fa true, wen de bossman come home, ef e find um da do dem ting wa e done tell um fa do.
A da tell oona fa true, de bossman gwine gim chaage oba all e propaty an ting.
Bot wa gwine happen ef dat wokman een chaage tink say, ‘Fa long time now, me bossman ain come back.’ Den e staat fa beat op pon all dem man an ooman. An de wokman een chaage jes da nyam an drink an git dronk.
Ef dat wokman een chaage ain do wa e spose fa do an e treat de oda wokman dem bad, one day e bossman gwine come back home wen dat wokman ain spect um. De bossman gwine whip dat wokman too bad. E gwine mek um suffa jes like de people dat ain bleebe God.
“De wokman dat know wa e bossman wahn um fa do, bot e ain git esef ready an e ain do um, e gwine git whip good fashion.
Bot de wokman dat ain know wa e bossman wahn um fa do an stillyet e do ting wa mek de bossman whip um, e bossman ain gwine whip um bad. God spect plenty fom de poson wa e done gii plenty ta. E spect mo fom de poson wa e been gii mo ta.”
Jedus say, “A come fa bring fire dat gwine bun pon de eart, an A wish wid ebryting een me dat e done staat fa bun now.
A haffa go shru a whole heapa suffrin. A got a burden fa dis ting til A done oba dat.
Oona tink say, A come fa bring peace ta de people een de wol, ainty? No, A da tell oona, dat ain hoccome A come yah. Cause A come, people ain gwine gree wid one noda. Dey gwine tek side ginst one noda an wide op.
Fom now on, a fambly wa got fibe people een um gwine fight ginst one noda an wide op. Shree people wid me gwine fight ginst de oda two een de fambly. An two people wid me gwine fight ginst de oda shree.
Dey gwine wide op. De fada gwine fight ginst e son, an de son gwine fight ginst e fada. De modda gwine fight ginst e daughta, an de daughta gwine fight ginst e modda. De moda-een-law gwine fight ginst e daughta-een-law, an de daughta-een-law gwine fight ginst e moda-een-law.”
Jedus tell de crowd say, “Wen oona see de cloud dem da rise op oba yonda een de west, tareckly oona know say, ‘E gwine be bad weda,’ an e bad weda fa true.
An wen oona feel de sout wind da blow, oona know say, ‘E gwine git hot,’ an e git hot fa true.
Oona hypicrit! Oona know how fa look ta de eart an ta de eliment an tapetate bout de weda. Den hoccome oona ain know wa dem ting mean bout me wa dey yah een dis wol now? Fa true, oona ain wahn fa know, ainty?”
“Hoccome oona ain jedge fa oonasef wa right fa do?
Ef anybody aagy wid one ob oona an e da tek ya ta court, ya mus try fa settle wid um fo ya git dey. Cause ef ya ain able fa settle wid um, e gwine drag ya ta de jedge. An de jedge gwine gii ya ta de police, an e gwine tek ya ta de jailhouse.
Ef dat so e stan, A da tell ya, ya gwine stay een de jailhouse til ya done pay de las cent ob de fine wa ya owe.”
Dat same time, some people wa been dey tell Jedus bout dem people fom Galilee wa Pilate, de Roman gobna, gii orda fa kill wiles dey beena offa op sacrifice fa woshup God.
Jedus ansa um say, “Oona tink dat dem Galilee people wa Pilate kill, dey dead like dat cause dey done ebil mo den all de oda res ob de people een Galilee, ainty?
No, A tell oona, e ain so! An ef oona dohn change oona sinful way, oona gwine git kill op jes like dem.
An oona memba bout dem eighteen people ta Siloam, wa git kill op wen de towa fall pontop um? Wa oona tink bout dat? Oona tink dat dey dead like dat cause dey done ebil mo den de oda res wa lib een Jerusalem, ainty?
No, A da tell oona, ef oona dohn change oona sinful way, oona gwine git kill op jes like dem.”
Jedus tell um a paable. E say, “One man hab fig tree wa beena grow een e gyaaden. Ebry now an den e beena come look op een um fa find fig, cep no fig ain neba been dey een dat tree.
So e tell e wokman say, ‘Dis yeah mek shree yeah dat A beena come look op een dis tree fa find fig, bot A ain neba find none dey. E ain wot nottin. Mus chop um down! Ain mek no sense fa waste de groun.’
Bot de wokman beg um say, ‘Sah, do please, lef de tree dey jes til nex yeah. A gwine dig roun um an pit fertiliza ta um.
Ef de tree beah fig nex yeah, well an good. Bot ef e ain beah no fig, ya kin tell me fa chop um down.’ ”
One Jew Woshup Day, Jedus beena laan de people een one Jew meetin house.
One ooman been dey wa hab a ebil sperit dat done mek um sick fa eighteen yeah. Cause ob dat, de ooman been bend oba an e ain able fa stanop scraight.
Wen Jedus shim, e call um fa come ta um. E tell um say, “Sista, fom now on, ya ain gwine be sick wid dis no mo!”
Jedus pit e two han pon dat ooman, an tareckly e stanop. E back scraighten op, an de ooman praise God.
De leada ob de meetin house been mad down cause Jedus mek de sick ooman well pon de Woshup Day. E tell de people say, “Six day we spose fa wok, so oona oughta come pon one dem day fa hab Jedus heal oona. Mus dohn come pon de Woshup Day!”
De Lawd ansa um say, “Oona hypicrit! Pon da Woshup Day oona ontie oona ox or mule fom de stable, tek um fa drink wata, ainty?
Dis ooman, e one ob Abraham chullun. Satan done bine um down sick dese las eighteen yeah. Ain A oughta heal dis ooman pon de Woshup Day too?”
Wen Jedus tell um dis, wa e say mek all dem wa been ginst um shame. An all de oda res de people rejaice cause ob all de great ting dem Jedus beena do.
Jedus say, “Wa e like wen God da rule? Wa ting A gwine tek fa sho how e stan?
Wen God da rule, e stan like one leeleetle mustard seed dat a man tek an plant een e gyaaden. De seed grow til e ton ta a tree, an de bod dem come an mek nes pon e limb.”
Jedus tell um gin say, “Wa ting A gwine tek fa sho how e stan wen God da rule?
E stan like yeast wa a ooman tek an mix um wid a big sack ob flour til de whole dough rise op.”
Wiles Jedus beena head fa Jerusalem, e beena laan de people een dem town an settlement weh e pass shru.
Somebody aks Jedus say, “Lawd, e jes a few people wa God gwine sabe?” Den Jedus laan um an de oda people.
E say, “De door ta de place weh God da rule, e leeleetle fa true. Oona mus do de bes ya kin fa go shru um an go eenside. Cause A da tell oona say, plenty people gwine try fa go eenside weh God da rule an dey ain gwine be able fa go shru de door.
De time gwine come wen de one wa de house blongst ta gwine git op an lock de door. Den oona gwine stanop outside de door an knock, say, ‘Lawd, Lawd, do please, open de door fa we!’ De Lawd gwine ansa say, ‘A ain know oona. An A ain know weh oona come fom!’
Den oona gwine say, ‘We done nyam an drink longside ya. Ya done laan de people een de screet weh we lib at!’
De Lawd gwine ansa gin say, ‘A ain know oona. A ain know weh oona come fom. All oona wickity people, git way fom me!’
Oona gwine see Abraham, Isaac, Jacob an all de prophet dem eenside de place weh God da rule. Bot oona gwine cry an gnash ya teet, cause dey gwine chunk oona out.
People gwine come fom all oba de wol, fom de east an de west, fom de nort an de sout. Dey gwine come ta de table fa feas een de place weh God da rule.
Den fa true some dem wa las now, dey gwine be fus, an some dem wa fus now, dey gwine be las.”
Same time, some Pharisee come ta Jedus an tell um say, “Ya mus go way fom yah, cause Herod da scheme fa kill ya.”
Jedus ansa um say, “Dat man Herod like a fox. Oona go tell um A say, ‘A da dribe out ebil sperit an heal sick people taday an demarra. Wen dat time done pass, atta shree day, A gwine be shru wid me wok yah.’
Stillyet, A haffa be pon me way ta Jerusalem taday an demarra an de nex day. Jerusalem weh dey da kill de prophet dem, ainty?
“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Oona kill de prophet dem an chunk rock til oona kill dem wa God sen ta oona! Hommuch time A been wahn fa geda oona people togeda roun me, jes like a hen geda e biddy dem ondaneet e wing! Bot oona people ain wahn me fa do dat!
So God gwine lef de place weh oona dey. A da tell oona, oona ain gwine see me gin til de time come wen oona gwine say, ‘God bless de one dat e done sen, dat come een de Lawd name.’ ”
One Jew Woshup Day Jedus gone fa nyam dinna ta one de Pharisee leada dem house. An de people wa been dey beena watch Jedus fa see wa e gwine do.
One sick man come ta Jedus wa hab de dropsy. E han an e foot been swell op.
Jedus aks de Jew Law teacha dem an de Pharisee dem say, “De Law say weza or no ya kin heal poson pon de Woshup Day?”
Bot de Law teacha dem an de Pharisee dem ain crack e teet. Jedus heal de sick man, an sen um pon e way.
Den Jedus aks de leada dem say, “Sposin one ob oona hab a mule eeda a ox wa fall een de well pon de Woshup Day. Wa ya gwine do? Ya gwine mek hace an pull um outta de well, ainty?”
Dem leada ain been able fa say nottin ginst wa Jedus tell um.
Jedus see dat some de compny wa been aks fa come ta dinna been go ta de bes place ta de table fa nyam. Cause ob dat, e tell um one paable.
E say, “Wen dey eenbite one ob oona ta a marry feas, ya mus dohn go ta de front ob de room fa nyam. Cause ef dat place been sabe fa somebody else een some mo high op position den ya,
wen dat poson come, de poson wa been eenbite ya, e gwine haffa come tell ya say, ‘Mus git op, leh dis man yah hab dat place!’ Den ya gwine be too shame, an ya gwine haffa go tek a place een de back ob de room.
Steada dat, wen dey eenbite ya ta de marry feas, go seddown een de back. Den wen de poson wa eenbite ya come ta ya, e gwine tell ya say, ‘Me fren, moob on op ta de front weh e mo betta.’ All dem oda people dey een de marry feas gwine see dat ya git hona.
Cause dem wa pit deysef op high, God gwine bring um down low fa mek um humble, an dem wa humble, God gwine hona dem mo den all.”
Den Jedus tell de man wa eenbite um say, “Wen ya hab dinna eeda a big feas, mus dohn eenbite ya fren dem, ya broda dem, ya kin, needa ya rich neighba dem. Cause den dey gwine eenbite ya back ta dey house fa nyam, an wen dey eenbite ya back, ya done git ya payback.
Bot wen ya hab feas, mus eenbite dem wa ain got much, dem wa cripple op, an dem wa ain able fa waak good, an dem wa bline.
Dem people ain able fa gii ya de payback fa de good ya done fa um. Bot God gwine bless ya fa dat good ya done. E gwine gii ya de payback pon de day wen dem dat done wa God say gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin.”
One dem wa beena nyam ta de table wid Jedus yeh wa e say. Dat man tell Jedus say, “Dem dat gwine be ta de big feas wen God da rule, dey sho gwine be bless!”
Jedus ansa um say, “One time one man beena mek a big feas, an e eenbite plenty compny fa come.
Wen de time come dat de food been ready fa nyam, e sen e wokman fa go ta dem people dat e been eenbite, tell um say, ‘Come ta de feas. Ebryting done ready now!’
Bot all dem staat fa mek scuse, say dey ain able fa go nyam now. De fus one say, ‘A jes buy a piece ob lan, an A haffa go fa look um oba. Do please, tell ya bossman A saary A ain able fa come nyam wid um.’
Noda one say, ‘A jes buy ten oxen, an A da gwine fa try um fa see how dey da wok. Do please, tell ya bossman A saary A ain able fa come nyam wid um.’
Noda say, ‘A jes git marry. Cause ob dat, A ain able fa come nyam wid um.’
De wokman gone back an tell e bossman all wa dey say. De bossman been too bex, an e tell e wokman say, ‘Ron quick! Go ta de main screet an de back screet een de town. Bring yah de people wa ain got nottin, de cripple op, an dem wa ain able fa waak good, an dem wa bline.’
Wen de wokman come back, e tell e bossman say, ‘Sah, A done do all wa ya tell me fa do. Stillyet, plenty room lef dey fa mo people.’
De bossman tell um say, ‘Go ta de main highway an de back road wa go ta dem settlement an mek de people dey come yah fa full op me house!
A da tell oona fa true, ain none dem people dat A been eenbite fus fa come nyam wid me gwine taste one leetle bit ob de food wa A fix fa de feas!’ ”
Plenty people beena trabel long wid Jedus. E ton roun an taak ta dem.
E tell um say, “Whosoneba wahn fa be me ciple mus lob me mo den e lob e fada an e modda. E mus lob me mo den e wife an e chullun, e broda an e sista dem. E mus lob me mo den e lob e own sef. Ef e ain lob me like dat, e ain able fa be me ciple.
Whosoneba dohn tote e own cross an come folla hine me, dat poson cyahn be me ciple.
“Ef one ob oona wahn fa mek a towa fa nyuse fa watch oba ya fiel, fus ya gwine seddown an figga hommuch e gwine cost. Ya gwine see ef ya got nuff money fa build all de towa.
Ef ya ain do dat, an ya lay de foundation an den ya ain able fa git shru build de towa, den ebrybody gwine mek fun ob ya.
Dey gwine say, ‘Dis man staat fa mek e towa, bot e ain able fa finish um!’
“An sposin one king hab ten tousan sodja an e gwine out fa fight noda king wa come ginst um wid twenty tousan. Dat king haffa fus seddown an figga ef e an e sodja dem scrong nuff fa fight dem twenty tousan.
Ef e ain scrong nuff fa fight um, fo de oda king an e sodja dem git close ta e country, e gwine sen e messenja dem ta de oda king, meet um an tell um say, ‘We ain wahn fa fight ginst oona. Leh we see how we kin settle dis ting.’ ”
Den Jedus say, “Same fashion, ain none ob oona kin be me ciple ef e ain hab de mind fa lef ebryting wa e got.
“Salt taste good een oona mout, bot ef de salt done loss e taste, ain no way oona kin mek um git e good taste back.
Dat salt ain no good fa de groun, needa fa mek fertiliza. E ain good fa nottin bot fa chunk out. Oona got yea fa yeh, ainty? Den oona mus yeh wa A da say!”
A heapa people come geda roun Jedus fa yeh wa e say. Dem wa geda tax come an dem oda Jew people dat de Jew dem ain neba mix op wid cause dey ain keep all de Jew Law.
Dat mek de Pharisee dem an de Law teacha dem staat fa mek chaage say, “Dis man Jedus da mix op wid bad people, an e eben da nyam wid um!”
So Jedus tell um one paable.
E say, “Sposin a hundud sheep blongst ta one ob oona. Ef one ob dem sheep git loss, wa ya fa do? Sho nuff, ya gwine lef de ninety-nine wa safe een de fiel, an ya gwine saach fa de one wa loss til ya find um, ainty?
Wen ya done find um, ya gwine be too glad, so ya gwine pit um cross ya shoulda.
Wen ya git home, ya gwine hail ya fren dem an ya neighba dem, geda um roun an say, ‘A been loss one ob me sheep, an A saach fa um til now A done find um. Come, we gwine rejaice an mek merry!’
A da tell oona, same fashion, dem wa een heaben rejaice wensoneba eben jes one sinna change e way an do wa God wahn um fa do. Fa true, dey gwine rejaice fa dat one mo den fa ninety-nine oda res wa tink say dey ain haffa change dey way.
“Same way, sposin a ooman hab ten piece ob silba money. Ef one ob dem git loss, wa e gwine do? Sho nuff e gwine light de lamp an sweep de house good fashion. E gwine saach ebryweh til e find um, ainty?
Den, wen e done find um, e gwine hail e fren an neighba dem. E gwine tell um say, ‘A been hab ten piece ob silba money an A loss one. A saach fa um til now A done find um. Come, we gwine rejaice an mek merry!’
A da tell oona fa true, jes like dey all rejaice wen dat ooman find e money, same fashion, God angel dem da rejaice tommuch wen eben jes one sinna change e sinful way an do wa God wahn um fa do.”
Den Jedus tell um say, “One man been hab two son.
De nyounga son say, ‘Fada, mus gii me me share ob de propaty wa A spose fa hab.’ So de man wide op e propaty tween e two son dem.
Ain long atta dat, de nyounga son sell all e hab. E tek e money an e gone ta a place way off. E ron roun dey da lib loose life, an e shrow way all e money.
Atta e done spen all e hab, a dry drought come shru oba all dat place an de people ain hab nottin fa nyam. Hongry come ta dat son doorstep. E ain hab nottin.
So e gone fa wok fa a man een dat country, an de man sen um ta e fiel fa mind de pig dem.
E been so hongry dat e been wahn fa nyam de pig slop. Bot nobody ain gim nottin fa nyam.
Wen e come ta e sense, e say ta esef, ‘All dem wa wok fa me fada hab mo den nuff food fa nyam, an A yah da staab!
A gwine git op an go ta me fada an tell um say, “Fada, A done sin ginst God an ginst ya.
Cause ob wa A done, A ain fit fa ya fa call me ya son no mo. Ya mus treat me same like ya da treat ya wokman dem.” ’
So de son git op, an e gone back ta e fada. “E still been a long way off fom de house wen e fada shim. E fada been too saary fa um, an e ron quick, gone an hug an kiss um.
E son tell um, ‘Fada, A done sin ginst God an ginst ya. A ain fit fa ya fa call me ya son no mo.’
Bot e fada tell e wokman dem say, ‘Mek hace an git de bes cloes fa me son fa weah. Pit a ring pon e finga, an pit shoe pon e foot.
Den, oona gwine go git de bes calf an kill um so we kin hab a feas an mek merry.
Cause dis son yah ob mine been dead, bot now e da lib gin. E been loss, bot we done find um.’ So dey staat fa hab a feas an mek merry.
“Same time, de man fusbon son been een de fiel. Wen e git close ta de house, e yeh music an de people da dance.
So e call one de wokman an aks um say, ‘Wa gwine on yah?’
De wokman tell um say, ‘Ya broda done come home, an ya fada kill e bes calf an hab feas, cause e been git e son back. Ya broda been loss, bot now e home safe an soun.’
De big broda been so mad til e ain wahn eben fa go eenside de house. So e fada gone out an beg um fa come een.
Bot e ansa e fada say, ‘See yah, all dese yeah A beena wok haad like a slabe fa ya, an A da pay ya mind all de time. Stillyet, ya ain neba gii me eben a leetle goat fa hab feas wid me fren dem.
Bot dis yah son, ya son wa waste all ya money an ron roun wid loose ooman, wen e come home, ya kill de bes calf fa um!’
E fada tell um say, ‘Me son, ya dey yah wid me all de time, an all wa A got blongst ta ya.
Bot we right fa feas an mek merry, cause ya broda done been dead, an now e da lib gin. E been loss, bot we done find um.’ ”
Jedus tell e ciple dem say, “One time a rich man hab one wokman een chaage ob e propaty. Dat rich man yeh say dat de wokman ain been scraight, dat e beena loss e bossman money.
De rich man call de wokman an aks um say, ‘Wa dis A yeh bout ya? Gii me de book weh ya da write all dat ya done tek een an all wa ya done spen. Cause ya ain gwine hab chaage oba me propaty no mo.’
De wokman een chaage say ta esef, ‘Wa A gwine do now? Me bossman ain gwine leh me wok fa um no mo. A ain scrong nuff fa dig ditch, an A too shame fa beg.
Now den, A know wa A gwine do so dat people gwine eenbite me ta dey house atta A done loss me job.’
So de wokman sen an call fa all de people wa owe e bossman, one atta de oda. Wen dey come, e aks de fus one say, ‘Hommuch ya owe me bossman?’
E ansa say, ‘A hundud barrel ob olib oll.’ De one een chaage tell um say, ‘Yah ya bill. Seddown quick an change de one hundud wa done been write down dey ta fifty.’
Den de wokman een chaage aks noda one say, ‘Hommuch ya owe me bossman?’ Dat one ansa, ‘A owe um one tousan bushel ob wheat.’ De one een chaage tell um say, ‘Yah ya bill. Change de one tousan wa write down dey ta eight hundud.’
“Now den, de bossman say de ceitful wokman een chaage hab heapa sense. Fa true, de people wa tink all de time bout ting een dis wol, dey da tink good how fa deal wid people like deysef. Dey tink bout dat mo betta den de people wa da waak een God light.”
Jedus tell e ciple dem say, “A da tell oona, oona oughta spen money an ting een dis wol fa mek fren fa oonasef. Den wen de money an ting done gone, God gwine welcome oona eenta ya ebalastin home een heaben.
De poson dat ya kin trus fa tek chaage oba leetle bit an do good, dat de poson ya kin trus fa tek chaage an do good oba big ting. An de poson dat ain scraight bout leetle ting ain gwine do right wid big ting.
So den, ef dey ain able fa trus oona wid money an ting een dis wol, ain nobody gwine trus oona wid ting dat walyable fa true, ainty?
Ef dey ain able fa trus oona wid oda poson propaty, ain nobody gwine gii ya propaty fa ya own, ainty dough?
“One wokman ain able fa saab two massa. Ef e da try fa do dat, e gwine hate one an lob de oda one. E gwine be true ta one an hole de oda one cheap. Ya ain able fa saab God an be a slabe ta money same time.”
Wen de Pharisee dem yeh wa Jedus say, dey suck dey teet an shrow slam pon um, cause dey lob money a whole heap.
Bot Jedus tell um say, “Oona mek people tink dat oona ain da do bad. Bot God know wa dey een oona haat. Dem ting wa people say walyable fa true, dey ain wot nottin een God eye.
“De Law wa God gii Moses an de prophet dem, dem wod hab heapa tority til John wa Bactize come long. Fom dat time, dey da preach de Good Nyews bout how God da come fa rule, an all de people da do dey bes fa hab God fa rule oba um.
Bot e mo easy fa mek heaben an de whole wol disappeah den fa mek one leetle paat ob God Law loss wa e mean.
“A man wa worce e wife an gone marry noda ooman da lib een sin. Same fashion, a man wa gone marry ooman wa done been worce da lib een sin.”
“One time dey been a rich man wa dress fa beat de ban, an e hab feas an joy esef tommuch ebry day.
An one po man name Lazarus lib dey too. E been kiba wid sore. E ain able eben fa waak roun. An ebry day, dey come bring Lazarus, leddown ta dat rich man door.
Lazarus beena wahn fa nyam de scrap ob food wa lef oba, wa fall fom de table wen de rich man beena nyam. Pontop ob dat, de dog dem beena come long dey an lick dat po man sore.
“Den dat po man pass oba. God angel cyaa um fa seddown longside de ole people leada, Abraham, een heaben. De rich man pass oba too, an e git bury.
E gone ta hell, an e beena suffa tommuch oba dey. E raise e eye an see Abraham way off, an Lazarus been longside um.
So de rich man hail Abraham say, ‘Fada Abraham! Hab mussy pon me! Sen Lazarus fa me. Mek um pit e leetle finga een wata an come yah fa tetch me tongue an cool um off, cause A da suffa tommuch eenside dis yah fire!’
“Bot Abraham tell um say, ‘Me son, memba wen ya beena lib oba dey een de wol, ya beena joy yasef. Ya done git ya paat. Ya git all ya good ting fo ya pass oba. Same time Lazarus done git all de bad ting dem. Bot now e da joy esef yah an ya da suffa.
Fodamo, dey a deep deep ditch tween we an oona. Cause ob dat, dem wa wahn fa cross oba fom yah ta oona side ain able fa go, an dem ta oona side ain able fa cross ta yah weh we at.’
“De rich man say, ‘Well den, Fada Abraham, A beg ya, sen Lazarus ta me fada house.
A hab me fibe broda oba dey. Leh Lazarus go fa waan um. Leh Lazarus tell um say dat dey mus dohn lib de way A done lib een de wol. Den wen dey pass oba, dey ain haffa come yah ta dis place weh A da suffa tommuch.’
“Bot Abraham tell um say, ‘Ya broda dem hab de Book wa Moses an de prophet dem been write. Dem wod dey fa waan um. Leh um yeh an pay mind.’
“De rich man ansa say, ‘No, dat ain nuff, Fada Abraham. Me broda dem ain gwine listen ta wa Moses an de prophet dem done say een dem Book. Bot ef somebody wa done dead go fa waan um, dey gwine change dey sinful way an do wa God wahn um fa do.’
“Bot Abraham tell um say, ‘Ef ya broda dem ain listen ta wa Moses an de prophet dem done say een de Book, dey ain gwine pay mind ta somebody wa done dead, wa gone back een de wol fa waan um. Dey ain gwine change dey way.’ ”
Jedus tell e ciple dem say, “Fa true, ting gwine happen wa mek people do bad. Bot de poson wa mek dem ting happen gwine hab plenty trouble!
E mo betta fa dat poson ef dey tie a big grine stone roun e neck an chunk um eenta de sea. E mo betta ef e drown een de wata like dat den ef e mek one ob dem leetle one do bad.
So den, tek cyah wa ya do! “Ef one ob oona hab a broda wa da sin, ya mus buke um. Ef e change e sinful way, mus paadon um.
Eben ef e do ya bad seben time een one day, ef e ton back ebry time, come tell ya say, ‘A saary an A ain gwine do ya bad no mo,’ mus paadon um.”
Jedus postle dem tell um say, “Lawd, hep we bleebe God mo den we bleebe now.”
De Lawd ansa um say, “Ef oona bleebe een God, eben ef ya fait jes leetle like one leeleetle mustard seed, ya kin tell dis tree, ‘Tek yasef outta de groun an go stanop an grow een de sea!’ Eben dough ya fait ain no bigga den de mustard seed, dat mulberry tree gwine pay ya mind. E gwine do wa ya say.”
“Sposin one ob oona hab wokman wa da plow een de fiel or e da mind ya sheep. Wen de wokman come fom e wok, wa ya gwine tell um? Fa true, ya ain gwine tell um say, ‘Mus hurry op. Come seddown an nyam.’
No! Fa sho ya gwine tell de wokman say, ‘Go cook me suppa. Git yasef ready an pit de food pon de table. Atta A done shru nyam an drink, den ya kin hab sompin fa nyam an drink.’
De massa ain gwine praise de wokman jes cause dat wokman done wa e tell um fa do, ainty?
Oona stan jes so. Wen oona done do all wa de massa tell oona fa do, oona mus say, ‘We jes wokman. We ain desaab no praise, cause we jes done wa we spose fa do.’ ”
Pon e way ta Jerusalem, Jedus gone long shru de arie tween Samaria an Galilee.
Wen Jedus git close ta one settlement, e meet ten man wa been sick een dey skin wid leposy. Dem man beena stan faa way.
Dey holla say, “Jedus! Massa! Hab mussy pon we!”
Jedus shim an tell um say, “Oona go ta de Jew priest dem. Leh dem xamine oona.” Wiles dem man beena gwine fa see de priest, dey all been heal. Dey all clean an dey ain been sick no mo.
Wen one ob dem see dat e done been heal, e come back ta Jedus. E holla, da praise God.
E git down pon de groun een front ob Jedus foot an e tank um. An dat man been fom Samaria.
Jedus say, “A done mek ten man clean, ainty? Weh de oda nine dem?
Hoccome ain nobody ton back fa tank God cep dis one man wa ain one ob we Jew people? Hoccome de oda Jew man dem ain come back?”
Jedus tell de man say, “Git op an go home. Cause ya bleebe een me, ya done git heal.”
Some Pharisee aks Jedus wen God gwine come fa rule. Jedus ansa um say, “Wen God come fa rule, oona ain gwine see no sign fa sho dat.
Ain nobody gwine say, ‘Look yah, dey e dey dey!’ Needa, ‘Look yonda!’ Cause God da rule mongst oona.”
Jedus tell e ciple dem say, “De time gwine come wen oona gwine wahn bad fa see de Man wa Come fom God come back, eben ef e jes fa one day. Bot oona ain gwine shim.
People gwine tell oona say, ‘Look yonda, oba dey de Man wa Come fom God!’ Oda gwine say, ‘Look yah, e dey dey!’ Mus dohn go long wid um. Mus dohn folla um.
Wen de Man wa Come fom God come back ta de wol, ebrybody gwine be able fa shim, jes like lightnin dat flash cross de sky an light um op fom one side ta de oda.
Bot fo dis happen, e haffa suffa plenty ting, an de people wa lib taday ain gwine hab nottin fa do wid um.
Jes like how e been een Noah time, dat de way e gwine be wen de Man wa Come fom God gwine come back.
Een Noah time, de people beena nyam an drink an git marry op. Dey beena lib dat same way til dat day wen Noah gone eenside de ark. Den de big rain come, an all dem outside de ark git kill op een dat wata wa kiba um all op.
Same way, een Lot time, de people beena nyam an drink. Dey beena buy an sell. Dey beena plant crop an build house.
Bot de day wen Lot lef out fom Sodom, fire an sulfa stone come down fom heaben like rain an stroy all de people dey.
Dat so e gwine be dat day wen de Man wa Come fom God gwine come back ta de wol.
“Dat day dey, de poson wa dey pontop e house mus dohn tek time fa go down eenside e house fa geda e ting. Same way, de poson wa dey een e fiel, e mus dohn ton back ta e house.
Oona memba wa happen ta Lot wife!
Whosoneba da try fa sabe e life, e gwine loss e true life. Bot de poson wa loss e life cause ob me, e gwine hab de true life.
A da tell oona, dat night dey gwine be two people da sleep een de same bed. Angel gwine come tek one an lef de oda one.
Two ooman gwine be togeda, da grine meal. Angel gwine come tek one an lef de oda one. [
Two man gwine be een de fiel, da wok. Angel gwine come tek one an lef de oda one.]”
Jedus ciple dem aks um say, “Lawd, weh dem ting gwine happen?” Jedus ansa um say, “Wehsoneba dey a dead body, de buzzat dem gwine geda dey too.”
Jedus tell e ciple dem one paable fa laan um dat dey mus pray all de time ta God an mus bleebe dat God gwine ansa um.
Jedus say, “Dey been a jedge een one town. Dat jedge ain been scaid ob God, an e ain pay people no mind.
One wida ooman been dey een dat same town. Dis ooman beena go ta de jedge all de time an tell um say, ‘Mus please gii me wa right. Mus hep me ginst de one wa done me wrong.’
Fa a long time, de ooman come ta de jedge, bot de jedge ain done nottin. Bot atta wile e say ta esef, ‘Fa true, A ain scaid ob God, an A ain pay people no mind.
Bot cause dis ooman da bodda me all de time, A gwine gim wa right. Ef A ain do dat, e gwine keep on da come ta me til e weah me out!’ ”
An de Lawd say, “Oona yeh wa de jedge wa ain scraight say.
Now den, fa true, God gwine do wa right fa e people, dem dat e done pick an wa da aks um een de day time an een de night time fa hep um, ainty? De Lawd ain gwine be slow fa ansa um, ainty?
A da tell oona, God gwine mek hace fa do wa right fa um! Stillyet, wen de Man wa Come fom God come back gin, A wonda ef e gwine meet anybody een de wol wa bleebe een um!”
Jedus tell one paable ta de people dem wa tink dat dey beena do right an hole all de oda people cheap.
E say, “One time two man gone op ta God House fa pray. One dem been a Pharisee. De oda been a man wa geda tax.
“De Pharisee stanop an pray bout esef say, ‘A tank ya, God, cause A ain like all dem oda people. A ain tief fom nobody. A beena waak scraight an do wa de Law say. An A ain sleep wid oda man wife. An A tank ya dat A ain eben like dat man oba yonda wa da geda tax.
Two day ebry week A da fast so A kin woshup ya betta. A tek a tent ob all wa A git an gim ta ya.’
Bot de man wa da geda tax stan way off. E ain eben lif e eye ta heaben, cause e know e done sin. E beena beat e chest cause e too saary fa e sin. An e pray ta God say, ‘God, hab mussy pon me, cause A a sinna!’ ”
Jedus tell de people say, “Wen dat man gone back home, God done fagib um fa de ebil e done, an e stan right wid God. Bot God ain paadon de Pharisee. Cause dem wa pit deysef op, God gwine bring um down. Bot dem wa tek low, God gwine raise um op mo den all.”
Some people beena bring dey baby ta Jedus fa hab um pit e han pon dey head an bless um. Wen Jedus ciple dem shim, dey buke dem people fa do dat.
Bot Jedus call de chullun. E tell e ciple dem say, “Oona mus dohn stop de chullun. Leh um come ta me. Cause de people wa like dese chullun yah gwine hab God rule oba um.
A da tell oona fa true, de poson wa ain gree like a leeleetle chile fa leh God rule oba um, dat poson ain neba gwine hab God fa e King.”
One Jew leada come aks Jedus say, “Good Teacha, wa A mus do fa git ebalastin life?”
Jedus ansa um say, “Hoccome ya da say A good? Ain nobody good cep fa God.
Ya know wa God Law chaage we fa do. ‘Mus dohn sleep wid oda man wife. Mus dohn kill nobody. Mus dohn tief. Mus dohn tell lie pon nobody. Mus pay mind ta ya fada an ya modda.’ ”
De leada tell Jedus say, “A done keep all dem law fom wen A been a boy.”
Wen Jedus yeh wa de leada say, e tell um, “Stillyet ya mus do one mo ting. Mus go sell ebryting ya got an gii de money ta de people wa ain got nottin. Ef ya do dat, ya gwine hab tredja een heaben. Atta ya done gii way ya money, come folla me.”
Wen dat leada yeh wa Jedus say, e been sad, cause e been too rich.
Jedus see de man been too sad an e say, “Fa true e ain easy eben a leetle bit fa rich people fa leh God rule oba um.
E mo easy fa mek de camel go shru a needle eye den fa a rich man fa come onda God rule.”
De people wa yeh wa Jedus say, aks um, “Den who dat kin git sabe?”
Jedus ansa say, “God able fa do wa people ain able fa do.”
Den Peter say, “Look yah! We done lef ebryting fa folla ya.”
Jedus say, “A da tell oona fa true, ebrybody wa lef e house, or e wife, or e broda dem, or e modda or e fada, or e chullun so dat e kin leh God rule oba um, dat one gwine git plenty mo fom God.
Een dis time yah, God gwine gim plenty mo den wa e done lef fa folla God. An God gwine gim ebalastin life een de wol dat gwine come.”
Jedus tek de tweb ciple dem ta one side an tell um say, “Listen, we da gwine op ta Jerusalem. All de ting dem de prophet dem done write bout de Man wa Come fom God gwine happen fa true.
Dey gwine han um oba ta de people wa ain bleebe pon God. Dem people gwine shrow slam at um. Dey gwine hole um cheap an spit pon um.
Dey gwine whip um an den dey gwine kill um. Bot atta shree day, de Man wa Come fom God gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin.”
Bot de ciple dem ain ondastan none ob dese ting. Dey ain know wa e mean. Dey ain know wa e beena taak bout.
Wen Jedus git close ta Jericho, a bline eye man been dey, da seddown side de road, an e beena beg.
Wen de bline man yeh de crowd da pass, e aks de people say, “Wa gwine on?”
Dey tell um, “Jedus fom Nazareth da pass long dis way.”
Wen de bline man yeh dat, e holla say, “Jedus, Son ob David, hab mussy pon me!”
De people wa beena lead de crowd buke de man, tell um e mus hush op e mout. Bot de man holla mo louda say, “Son ob David, hab mussy pon me!”
Jedus stop dey, an e chaage de people fa bring de bline man ta um. Wen e git close ta Jedus, Jedus aks um say,
“Wa ya wahn me fa do fa ya?” De bline man ansa say, “Lawd, A wahn fa see gin.”
Jedus tell de man say, “A da mek ya see. Cause ya bleebe een me, ya done git well!”
Dat same time de man been able fa see. E folla longside Jedus, da praise God. Wen de crowd shim, dey all praise God too.
Jedus done gone eenta Jericho an beena pass shru dey.
One man been dey name Zacchaeus. E been a head man ob dem wa da geda tax, an e hab a heapa money.
Zacchaeus beena try fa see Jedus, bot e ain been able fa shim cause e been a shot man an e ain been able fa see oba de crowd wa been roun Jedus.
So Zacchaeus ron head ob de crowd an climb op a sycamo tree fa hab chance fa see Jedus, wa been gwine come long dat way.
Wen Jedus git ta de tree weh Zacchaeus been, e look op an tell um say, “Hurry op an come down, Zacchaeus, cause A haffa stay ta ya house taday.”
Zacchaeus come down quick. E tek Jedus ta e house an gim haaty welcome.
All de people wa shim een Zacchaeus house staat fa grumble say, “Jedus gone fa stay ta de house ob a man wa ain keep de Jew Law.”
Zacchaeus stanop an tell de Lawd say, “Look, Lawd! A gwine gii haf ob ebryting A got ta de po people. An ef A done tief fom anybody, A gwine gim back fo time wa A done tief fom um.”
Jedus tell um, “Taday God done sabe dis man an e fambly. Dis man one ob Abraham chullun too.
Cause de Man wa Come fom God, e come fa saach fa people wa loss, an sabe um.”
De people beena listen ta wa Jedus say. E been mos ta Jerusalem now, an dey beena tink say dat dey gwine see God come down an rule tareckly. So den, Jedus tell um one paable.
E say, “One time one man wa fom a king fambly beena gwine ta a country faa way fa leh dem mek um king an den e gwine come back home gin.
Fo de man lef, e call ten ob e wokman dem an gim each a gole coin. E tell um say, ‘See hommuch ya kin mek wid dis money fo A come back.’
“Now den, de people wa lib een dat country been hate um. Dey sen messenja dem atta um fa say, ‘We ain wahn dis man fa rule oba we.’
“Bot de man git mek king ob dey country, an e come back ta e house. Tareckly e sen fa e ten wokman dem fa come tell um hommuch money dey been mek wid e gole coin.
De fus wokman come an say, ‘Sah, A done mek ten mo gole coin wid de one wa ya gii me.’
De king tell um say, ‘Ya done good. Ya a good wokman. Cause A able fa trus ya fa do a leetle job, A gwine mek ya rula oba ten city.’
De secon wokman come ta de king an say, ‘Sah, A done mek fibe mo gole coin wid de one wa ya gii me.’
De king tell um say, ‘Ya gwine rule oba fibe city.’
Oda wokman come ta de king say, ‘Sah, yah de one gole coin wa ya been gii me. A been tie um op een a hankachief fa keep um safe.
A been scaid ob ya cause ya a haad man. Ya da tek dat wa ain ya own an ya da haabis wa ya ain plant!’
De king tell um say, ‘Ya a good fa nottin wokman. De wod wa ya own mout done taak A gwine nyuse fa condemn ya! Ya know A a haad man, ainty? A da tek dat wa ain me own an A da haabis wa A ain plant.
Ya oughta hab pit me money een de bank, an den wen A come back, leas A been gwine hab de money an de interest e done git too.’
Den de king tell de wokman dem wa beena stan dey, say, ‘Oona tek de one gole coin way fom dis man an gim ta de wokman wa hab ten.’
Dem wokman say, ‘Sah, dat man done hab ten coin!’
An de king ansa say, ‘A da tell oona say, dat ebry poson wa got sompin, God gwine gim mo. Bot de one wa ain got nottin, God gwine tek way dat leeleetle bit wa e got.
Now den, me enemy dem wa ain wahn me fa rule oba dem, fetch um yah an kill um een front ob me!’ ”
Atta Jedus say dat, e gone long head ob de people, da waak ta Jerusalem.
Wen e git close ta Bethphage an Bethany, dey ta de Mount Olib, e call two ob e ciple dem an e sen um on head ob um.
E tell um say, “Oona go ta de settlement wa dey head ob oona. Wen oona go eenta de settlement, oona gwine see one nyoung donkey dat dey done tie op dey. Nobody ain neba yet ride pon dat donkey. Mus ontie um an fetch um yah.
Ef anybody aks oona hoccome ya da ontie um, ansa um say, ‘De Lawd need um.’ ”
De two ciple dem gone long ta de settlement an dey find ebryting jes like Jedus tell um.
Wen dey beena ontie de nyoung donkey, dem wa e blongst ta aks um say, “Hoccome oona da ontie um?”
Dey ansa say, “De Lawd need um.”
Den dey tek de donkey ta Jedus. Dey pit dey cloes pontop de animal an hep Jedus git pon um.
Wiles Jedus beena ride long pon e way ta Jerusalem, de people spread some dey cloes pon de road fo um fa sho um hona.
Wen Jedus come fom de Mount Olib, da gwine down de hill, e come close ta Jerusalem. An all de big crowd ob people wa beena trabel long wid um staat fa rejaice an tank God. Dey beena holla ta de top ob dey boice, da praise God fa all de miracle dem wa dey beena see Jedus do.
Dey say, “God bless de King wa e done sen fa come een de name ob de Lawd! Leh dey be peace een heaben. We da gii glory ta God!”
Some de Pharisee dem dey een de crowd tell Jedus say, “Teacha, buke dem people wa da folla ya. Chaage um fa hush op dey mout!”
Jedus ansa um say, “A da tell oona, ef dem people hush op dey mout, dem rock yah gwine staat fa holla!”
Wen Jedus git close ta de city, e shim an e staat fa cry.
E say, “A wish oona dey een Jerusalem been know taday wa ting oona need fa hab peace! Bot oona ain able fa shim now!
De time da come wen oona enemy dem gwine build wall roun de city. Dey gwine hab oona pen op an fence op ta ebry side so dat oona ain gwine be able fa git outta dey.
Dey gwine stroy de city an all ob oona an eben all oona chullun. Dey gwine knock all de city stone dem ta de groun. Dey ain gwine lef eben one stone weh e stan. Dey gwine do all dat cause oona ain recognize de time wen God beena come fa sabe oona!”
Den Jedus gone eenside God House. E staat fa dribe out dem people wa beena sell ting eenside dey.
E tell um say, “God say een e wod, ‘Me house gwine be place weh people pray ta me!’ Bot oona done ton um ta place weh tief dem da hide!”
Jedus beena laan de people een God House ebry day. De leada dem ob de Jew priest dem, de Jew Law teacha dem, an de oda Jew leada dem beena try fa find way fa kill Jedus.
Bot dey ain been able fa figga how fa do um, cause all de people been dey, beena geda roun Jedus fa yeh um. Dey ain been wahn fa miss eben one wod e say.
One day wiles Jedus beena laan de people an da preach de Good Nyews, de leada dem ob de Jew priest dem, de Jew Law teacha dem an de oda Jew leada dem come ta Jedus.
Dey aks um say, “Tell we, wa gii ya de right fa do dem ting yah? Who dat gii ya de tority?”
Jedus ansa um say, “Leh me aks oona one queshon too. Oona tell me,
wen John wa Bactize people been come yah, who dat gim de right fa bactize. Tell me, God gim de tority, or de people gim de tority?”
Dey staat fa aagy mongst deysef say, “Wa we gwine ansa um? Ef we say ‘God gii John de tority fa bactize people,’ e gwine say, ‘Well den, hoccome oona ain bleebe um?’
Bot ef we say ‘People gii John dat tority,’ all dem people yah gwine chunk stone pon we, cause dey bleebe fa true dat John been a prophet.”
So dey ansa Jedus, say dey ain know who dat gii John de tority fa bactize people.
Jedus tell um say, “Well den, A ain needa gwine tell oona who dat gii me de tority fa do dem ting yah.”
Jedus tell de people one paable say, “One time one man plant some grapewine pon e faam. E hire some wokman fa tek cyah ob de faam an den e gone way ta noda country, an e stay dey a long time.
Wen de time come fa de grape haabis, de owna sen a saabant ta e faam fa fetch e share ob de haabis. Bot de wokman dem wa cyah fa e faam beat dat man wa de owna sen. Dey sen um back dout nottin.
De owna sen noda saabant fa fetch e share. Dey beat dat man too an shame um. Den dey sen um back wid nottin.
De owna sen still noda man. Dem wa cyah fa de faam beat dat one til dey hut um fa true, an dey chunk um off de faam.
De faam owna say, ‘Wa A gwine do now? A gwine sen me own deah son wa A lob. Dey gwine show hona ta me son.’
Bot wen dem wa cyah fa de faam see de owna son come, dey all taak togeda say, ‘Dis de owna son. Dis propaty yah gwine be lef ta um. Leh we kill um so dat de propaty gwine come ta we.’
Den dey chunk de owna son off de faam, an dey kill um. “Now den,” Jedus aks de people say, “Wa dat faam owna gwine do ta dem wokman?
E gwine come an kill dem, an e gwine gii e faam ta oda wokman dem.” Wen de people yeh wa Jedus say, dey say, “Fa sho, dat mus dohn happen!”
Jedus look scraight at um an aks um say, “Well den, oona tell me wa dey mean wen dey write een God Book say, ‘De same stone dat de builda dem chunk out, dat de stone wa come fa be portant mo den all de oda res.’
“De poson wa faddown pon dis stone yah gwine broke op all e bone dem. An wen dis stone faddown pon a poson, e gwine mash um all op.”
Now, dem Law teacha an dem priest leada ondastan dat Jedus been tell dat paable ginst dem. So dat same time, dey try fa ketch Jedus an hole um. Bot dey ain ketch um cause dey been scaid ob de people dey.
So dey beena watch Jedus fa try fa ketch um. Dey pay some man dem, sen um ta Jedus. De tell dem man fa mek like dey mean wa dey say fa true, an chaage um fa aks Jedus schemy queshon. Dey plan fa tek de wod wa Jedus ansa fa ketch um, say e taak bad ting. Den dey kin go cuse Jedus an tek um ta de Roman gobna, wa hab tority an powa fa jedge um.
De man dem wa dey beena pay fa ketch Jedus come ta um fa aks um schemy queshon. Dey tell Jedus say, “Teacha, we know wa ya da say an laan we, e right fa true. We know ya da look pon all people de same. Fa true ya da teach God way.”
Den dey aks um say, “E right fa we fa pay tax ta de Roman rula Caesar? Wa de Jew Law say bout dat?”
Bot Jedus obareach um. E been know dey beena try fa ketch um een e wod. So e chaage um say,
“Show me a coin.” Wen dey show um dat money, e aks um say, “Who dat hab e face an e name pon dis coin yah?” Dey ansa Jedus say, “Dat Caesar face an name dey.”
Jedus say, “Well den, mus gii Caesar dat wa blongst ta Caesar an gii God wa blongst ta God.”
So den wid all de people dey, dem man ain been able fa ketch Jedus een none ob de wod wa e say. Wen Jedus ansa um so, dey been stonish down an dey hush op dey mout.
Some Sadducee come ta Jedus. De Sadducee dem bleebe dat dead people ain gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin.
Dey aks Jedus say, “Teacha, Moses write law fa we say, ‘Ef a man dead an lef e wife an ain hab no chullun, de man broda mus marry de wida ooman fa hab chullun een de name ob de man wa done pass oba.’
One time dey been seben broda. De fus one marry an e pass oba. E ain lef no chullun.
De nex broda marry e broda wida ooman. An dat broda pass oba an ain lef no chullun fa e dead broda.
Den de nex broda marry de wida ooman an e pass oba. De same ting happen ta all de seben broda dem. Dey all marry dat ooman, one atta de oda, an dey all pass oba an ain hab no chullun.
Las ob all, de wida ooman esef pass oba.
All seben broda done marry dat ooman. So den, tell we, wen de time come wen de dead people gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin, who dat gwine hab dat ooman fa e wife?”
Jedus ansa de Sadducee dem say, “Yah een dis wol de people da git marry op.
Bot atta dey pass oba, de people dem wa God see fit fa mek um git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin, dey ain fa be marry.
Dey gwine be like de angel dem, an dey cyahn dead no mo. Dey God chullun, cause dey done been dead bot now dey done git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin.
Moses eben show dat dem wa done dead git op fom de grabe an lib gin. E show dat dey een God Book, weh e write down bout de bush dat beena bun. Dey dey e call de Lawd ‘de God ob Abraham, de God ob Isaac, an de God ob Jacob.’
E de God ob dem wa da lib. E ain no God ob dead people. Cause ta God all people da lib.”
Some de Law teacha dem tell Jedus say, “Teacha, dat a good ansa!”
Atta dat, de people been scaid fa aks Jedus oda queshon.
Jedus aks um say, “Hoccome people say dat de Messiah gwine be de chile ob David chullun chullun?
Cause David done write down een de book ob Psalms say, ‘De Lawd tell me Lawd say, seddown yah ta me right han side
til A pit ya enemy dem ondaneet ya foot.’
David call de Messiah ‘Lawd.’ So den how de Messiah kin be David son?”
Wiles all de people beena listen, Jedus taak ta e ciple dem.
E say, “Oona mus be on de watch fa de Law teacha dem. Dey like fa waak roun een dey long robe fa mek people say dey a big leada. An dey lob fa go ta de maakut place weh plenty people geda, so dat de people kin gim hona. Wen dey go ta de Jew meetin house, dey lob fa seddown een de bes seat. An wen dey go ta de feas, dey lob fa seddown een de place weh de big leada dem seddown.
Dem Law teacha yah tek oba wida ooman propaty an tief all dey got. An den dey stanop da pray long time so dat people kin say dey good people fa true! God gwine punish dem mo den e gwine punish oda people.”
Jedus been ta God House. E beena look roun, an e see de rich people come an drop dey money wa dey da gii ta God eenta de money box dey.
Same time e see one po wida ooman come too. E drop two leetle coppa coin eenta de box.
Jedus say, “A da tell oona fa true, dis po wida ooman yah done gii mo den all de oda people.
Cause de oda res come an gii jes a leetle bit fom all de whole heapa money dey got. Bot dis ooman wa too po done gii all de money e got fa lib off.”
Some de ciple dem beena taak bout God House, how e stan so purty, wid e fine stone an all de ting dey wa people done gii fa God. Jedus say,
“Oona see all dis? De time gwine come wen none dese stone yah wa oona da see ain gwine be lef een dey place, one pontop de oda. Ebry stone yah gwine be chunk down outta e place.”
Dey aks Jedus say, “Teacha, wen dat gwine happen? Wa sign gwine show we dat time done come?”
Jedus tell um say, “Oona mus be on de watch. Mus dohn leh nobody fool oona. Cause plenty man dem gwine come een me name. Dey gwine say, ‘A de Messiah!’ An dey gwine say, ‘De time done come!’ Oona mus dohn go long wid dem.
Mus dohn be scaid wen oona yeh bout waa an rebolution. Dem ting haffa happen fus, bot dat ain mean dat de end time done come.”
Den Jedus tell um say, “De country dem ob de wol gwine fight ginst one noda. Nation gwine scrike out ginst oda nation.
De groun gwine shake too bad. A dry drought gwine come shru an people ain gwine hab nottin fa nyam. A whole heapa people gwine git sick an dat sick gwine spread all roun. All dat gwine happen een plenty place all oba de wol. Plenty ting gwine happen fa mek people scaid ta det, an dey gwine be great ting een de sky fa sho people wa gwine come.
Bot fo all dem ting happen, de people wa hab tority gwine grab hole ta oona an do oona plenty bad ting. Dey gwine drag oona fa be jedge fo de leada dem een de Jew meetin house, an dey gwine pit oona een de jailhouse. Dey gwine bring oona fo king dem an gobna dem cause oona me ciple dem.
Dat de time dey wen oona gwine hab good chance fa tell de people de true ting wa oona know bout me.
Bot fo dey grab hole ta oona an tek oona fa be jedge, mus mek op ya mind dat ya ain gwine fret bout wa ya gwine ansa um.
Cause A gwine gii ya nuff wise wod an sense fa ansa dem. Eben oona enemy dem gwine haffa gree wid wa ya tell um.
Bot eben ya modda an fada, ya broda dem, ya fambly, an ya fren dem gwine han ya oba ta de tority fa tek ya fo de jedge. An dem tority gwine kill some ob oona.
All de people gwine hate oona cause oona bleebe een me.
Stillyet, ain eben one hair een oona head gwine be loss.
Mus stan firm, an oona gwine git true life.
“Bot wen oona see de aamy dem da geda all roun Jerusalem, oona gwine know dat de time done come wen dat city gwine be stroy.
Dat de time wen de people een Judea mus ron way quick ta de hill country. Dem een de city ob Jerusalem mus lef dey, an dem wa out een de country mus dohn go eenta dat city.
Cause dat de time dey wen God gwine punish de people an do all dat de prophet dem done write down een God Book.
Dat time gwine be mighty haad fa ooman dem wa een de fambly way an dem wa hab leetle baby! De people een dis lan gwine suffa too bad. God gwine show dat e bex fa true an punish dis people.
Some dem gwine git kill wid de sode. Oda dem gwine git ketch an be prisona, an oda people gwine cyaa um way ta all de diffunt country dem. De people fom dem oda lan gwine tek chaage oba Jerusalem, trample um down all oba til de time come fa dem people wa ain Jew fa loss dey powa.
“Scrange ting gwine happen ta de sun an de moon an de staa fa sho people wa da come. A whole heapa people een plenty place een dis wol ain gwine know wa fa do. Dey gwine be scaid fa true wen dey see de salt wata git rough an de swellin ob dat tide wata roll like tunda.
People gwine pass out. Dey gwine be scaid ta det, wiles dey da wait fa see wa gwine happen ta all de wol. De powa wa dey een de eliment gwine shake an moob outta dey place weh dey spose fa be.
Dat de time wen de people gwine see de Man wa Come fom God da come down een a cloud eenta de wol. E gwine hab great powa, an a too bright light gwine shine roun um.
Wen oona see dem ting staat fa happen, oona oughta stanop. Look op ta God, cause e gwine sabe oona soon.”
Jedus tell um a paable, say, “Look at de fig tree an all de oda tree dem.
Wen oona see dem leaf da buss open, oona know dat summa gwine come soon, ainty?
Same way, wen oona see dem ting wa A done taak bout staat fa happen, oona gwine know dat de time wen God gwine rule ain way off.
“A da tell oona fa true, all dem ting yah gwine happen fo de people wa da lib now pass oba.
De eliment an de wol esef ain gwine las faeba, bot me wod gwine las faeba an eba.
“Oona mus tek cyah wa oona da do. Mus dohn leh oona mind ron on all de time bout tommuch nyam an drink. Mus dohn fret tommuch bout oona trouble een dis wol. Cause ef oona do, dat day gwine come all ob a sudden, wen oona ain ready.
Dat day gwine come pon all de people all oba de wol, like a trap close quick pon a bod.
Oona mus be on de watch an pray all de time so dat oona gwine hab scrent fa beah all dem ting wa gwine happen een dis wol an be able fa stan fo de Man wa Come fom God.”
Jurin dat time, Jedus beena spen de day da laan de people een God House, an wen fus daak come, e gone an spen de night ta de Mount Olib.
Ebry maanin wen day clean, all de people wa e beena laan, dey gone fa meet um een God House fa yeh wa e gwine laan um dat day.
De time mos come fa de Feas ob Unleaven Bread, de Jew holiday wen dey nyam bread wa ain hab no yeast een um. Dey call dat de Passoba holiday.
De leada dem ob de Jew priest dem an de Law teacha dem beena study dey head fa figga how fa kill Jedus dout nobody find out bout um. Cause dey been scaid ob de people.
Den Satan tek hole ta Judas wa dey call Iscariot. E been one ob de tweb ciple dem.
So Judas gone off an taak ta de priest leada dem an dem offisa ob dem wa gyaad God House. Judas taak ta um bout how e kin hep um ketch Jedus.
De leada dem been glad fa yeh dat, an dey offa fa pay Judas money fa do um.
Judas gree ta dat, an e staat fa saach fa way fa han Jedus oba ta um. Dey been wahn fa do dat wen dey ain gwine be no crowd ob people roun fa know bout um. So Judas look fa dat.
Jurin de Feas ob Unleaven Bread, de day come wen dey haffa kill de lamb fa mek sacrifice ta God, so dey kin nyam um an memba de Passoba wen God done bring e people outta Egypt lan.
So Jedus call Peter an John an tell um say, “Oona go git de Passoba food ready fa we fa nyam.”
Dey aks um, “Weh ya wahn we fa git um ready?”
Jedus ansa um, “Wen oona go eenta de city, oona gwine meet a man wa da tote a big jug ob wata. Oona mus folla dat man an go eenta de house weh e go.
Tell de man wa own dat house say, ‘De Teacha da aks ya weh de room weh e an e ciple dem gwine nyam de Passoba suppa.’
De man gwine show oona a big room opstair, wid all wa we need dey. Mus git de food ready dey.”
Peter an John gone ta de city, an dey find ebryting jes like Jedus tell um. So dey git de food ready fa nyam de Passoba suppa.
Wen de time come fa de Passoba suppa, Jedus come ta de table wid e tweb postle dem.
Jedus tell um say, “A been wahn fa nyam dis Passoba suppa wid oona too bad fo A suffa.
Cause A da tell oona, A ain gwine nyam um gin til all wa de Passoba stan fa come true, wen God gwine rule oba all ting een dis wol.”
Jedus tek de cup ob wine an e tank God. Den e say, “Oona pass dis cup roun an leh all oona drink.
Cause A da tell oona dat atta dis suppa, A ain gwine drink wine no mo til God rule oba dis wol.”
Jedus tek some bread an e tank God. Den e broke op de bread, gim ta e postle dem. E say, “Dis bread me body wa A da gii ta God fa oona sake. Oona mus nyam um fa memba me.”
Same way, atta de Passoba suppa, Jedus tek de cup ob wine an gim ta e postle dem. E say, “De wine een dis cup, e de nyew cobnant tween God an e people. A da seal dat cobnant wid me blood, wen A gree fa leh people kill me fa oona sake.
“Bot look yah! De poson wa gwine han me oba ta dem people wa wahn fa kill me, e da nyam wid me! E han right yah pon de table wid me!
De Man wa Come fom God gwine dead like God done cide um. Bot e gwine be too bad fa dat man wa da han um oba ta dem wa gwine kill um!”
Den de postle dem staat fa aks one noda say, “Wish one ob we gwine do dis ting wa Jedus taak bout?”
De ciple dem staat fa aagy wid one noda bout wish one ob dem dey oughta tink e great mo den all.
Jedus tell um say, “Dey een de wol, de king dem hab chaage oba dey people. An dem people call dey rula ‘De People Fren.’
Bot oona mus dohn neba be like dat. Steada dat, de poson wa greata mongst oona mus be like de nyounga. An oona leada mus be like de one wa da saab.
Ef oona hab two people, one wa seddown ta de table fa nyam an de oda poson wa da saab um, wish one de greata? Dat de poson wa da seddown ta de table, ainty? Bot A da stan mongst oona like a poson wa da saab.
“Oona beena stay wid me jurin all me haad time.
Me Fada done gii me tority fa rule oba people. Same fashion, A gwine gii oona tority fa rule.
Oona gwine nyam an drink ta me table wen A da rule. An oona gwine seddown pon shrone fa jedge de tweb tribe ob Israel.
“Simon, Simon, listen! Satan done aks fa test all ob oona fa wide op de good fom de bad, like a faama da wide op e grain fom de chaff.
Bot A done pray ta God fa ya, Simon, dat ya ain gwine loss ya fait een me. An wen ya done ton back ta me, ya mus hep ya broda dem git mo scronga.”
Peter ansa Jedus say, “Lawd, A ready fa go wid ya ta de jailhouse, an fa dead wid ya too!”
Jedus tell um say, “A da tell ya, Peter, fo de roosta crow taday, ya gwine say shree time dat ya ain know me.”
Den Jedus aks e ciple dem say, “Dat time wen A been sen oona fa go an tell de Good Nyews, A been chaage oona dat oona mus dohn tek no money, no bag needa no shoe. Oona ain hab need ob nottin jurin dat time, ainty?” Dey ansa um, “No, we ain been need nottin den.”
Den Jedus tell um say. “Bot now, ef oona hab money or a bag, mus tek um wid oona. An ef oona ain got no sode, mus sell oona coat an buy um.
Cause A da tell oona, wen de prophet write een God Book say, ‘People tink dat e one ob dem wickity people,’ e beena write bout me. All wa God wod say bout me da happen, fa true.”
De ciple dem say, “Look yah, Lawd! We hab two sode.” Jedus ansa um say, “Dat nuff!”
Jedus lef de city an gone ta de Mount Olib, jes like e nyuse fa do, an de ciple dem gone long wid um.
Wen e git ta de place, e tell um, “Oona mus pray ta God so dat wen Satan tempt oona, oona ain gwine fall eenta sin.”
Den Jedus lef um an gone a leetle bit mo, bout one hundud foot way. An e kneel down an pray ta God.
E say, “Fada, ef ya gree, do please, tek way dis cup wa A fa suffa. Stillyet, ya mus dohn do wa A wahn. Mus do wa ya wahn fa do.”
Den one angel come outta heaben ta Jedus an gim scrent.
Jedus beena suffa tommuch, an e pray eben mo haada. E sweat been like blood wa da drop down ta de groun.
Wen Jedus git op fom e pray, e gone back ta de ciple dem. Bot e see dat dey beena sleep, cause dey haat been too hebby.
Jedus tell um say, “Oona ain oughta sleep, ainty? Git op an pray ta God so dat wen Satan tempt oona, oona ain gwine fall eenta sin.”
Wiles Jedus beena taak, a crowd come op. Judas, one ob de tweb ciple dem, beena lead de people. An e come op ta Jedus fa kiss um.
Bot Jedus aks um say, “Judas, wid a kiss ya da han de Man wa Come fom God oba ta e enemy dem?”
Wen de ciple dem wa been wid Jedus see wa bout fa happen, dey aks Jedus say, “Lawd, kin we fight dem wid we sode?”
An one dem ciple tek e sode an scrike de saabant ob de head man ob de Jew priest dem an cut off e right yea.
Bot Jedus chaage e ciple dem say, “Dat nuff. Oona stop dat!” E tetch de saabant head an heal e yea.
Jedus aks de leada dem ob de priest dem an de leada dem wa beena gyaad God House an de oda Jew leada dem wa been come dey fa git um, e say, “Oona haffa come yah fa git me wid sode an stick like A been a robba?
A been wid oona ebry day een God House, an oona ain try fa grab hole ta me. Bot dis de time wen God gree fa leh oona tek me, now wen Satan wa da rule oba de daakness dey een chaage.”
Dey grab hole ta Jedus an tek um ta de head man ob de Jew priest dem, eenta e house. Peter folla long hine um bot e ain git close ta um.
Now a fire been light dey een de middle ob de head man yaad, an people beena seddown roun dat fire. So Peter gone an jine um.
One saabant gyal see Peter da seddown dey, wid de fire light da shine pon um. Dat gyal study Peter good fashion an e tell de people dey, say, “Dis man too been wid Jedus!”
Bot Peter say dat ain so. E tell um say, “Ooman, A ain eben know dat man!”
Atta wile, a man beena watch Peter. Dat man say, “Ya one ob dem wa been wid Jedus dem too!” Bot Peter ansa say, “Man, A ain!”
Atta bout one hour, noda man tell de people say, “Fa true, dis man yah been wid Jedus, cause e come fom Galilee too.”
Peter ansa um say, “Man, A ain know wa ya da taak bout!” Dat same time wen e beena say dat, a roosta crow.
De Lawd ton roun an look scraight at Peter. An Peter memba dat de Lawd done tell um say, “Fo de roosta crow taday, ya gwine say shree time dat ya ain know me.”
Peter gone outta de yaad an e cry bitta teah.
De sodja dem wa beena gyaad Jedus mek fun ob um an beat um.
Dey tie a rag oba e eye, den dey knock um an say, “Ef ya a prophet, tell we who dat knock ya!”
An dey tell Jedus plenty oda ting fa hole um cheap.
Wen day clean, dey hab meetin ob de Jew Council. De people leada dem, de leada dem ob de priest dem, an de Law teacha dem geda togeda, an de sodja dem tek Jedus fo dat Council.
De people ob de Council chaage Jedus say, “Ef ya de Messiah, ya mus tell we.” Jedus ansa um say, “Ef A tell oona, oona ain gwine bleebe me.
An ef A aks oona a queshon, oona ain gwine ansa me.
Bot fom now on, de Man wa Come fom God gwine seddown ta de right han ob God, wa hab all powa.”
All de people wa beena jedge um een de Council aks um say, “Well den, ya God Son?” Jedus ansa um say, “Oona right wen oona say dat.”
Den de people wa beena jedge um say, “We ain need no mo people wod ginst um. Wid we own yea we done yeh wa e say!”
All de crowd ob people wa beena jedge een de Jew Council grab hole ta Jedus an tek um way ta Gobna Pilate.
Den dey staat fa cuse Jedus, tell Pilate say, “We done find dis man da pit wod een we people yea fa mek um riot ginst de tority. E tell um say we ain spose fa pay tax ta Caesar. An e say e de Messiah. Dat mean e a king.”
Pilate aks Jedus say, “Ya de king ob de Jew people?” Jedus ansa um say, “Dat wa ya say. Dat so e stan.”
Pilate tell de leada dem ob de priest dem an de heapa people wa done geda dey say, “A ain see nottin bad wa dis man done.”
Bot de people dem ob de Council keep on da cuse um mo an mo. Dey tell Pilate say, “Jedus beena stir op de people wid de ting wa e da laan um all oba Judea. E staat een Galilee, an now e done come all de way yah ta Jerusalem.”
Wen Pilate yeh wa dem people say, e aks um ef Jedus been fom Galilee.
Soon as Pilate find out dat Jedus been fom Galilee, de arie weh Herod da rule, e sen Jedus ta Herod fa jedge um. An dat same time Herod been dey een Jerusalem too.
Herod been too glad wen e see Jedus, cause e done yeh bout um an been wahn fa shim fa a long time. E been wahn fa shim do some miracle.
Herod quizzit Jedus tommuch, bot Jedus neba ansa um eben a wod.
De leada dem ob dey priest dem an de Law teacha dem come stan fo Herod, da cuse Jedus still mo an mo.
An Herod an e sodja dem hole Jedus cheap. Dey laugh an suck dey teet, shrow insult pon um. An dey mek um weah a fine robe, like a king weah. Den Herod sen Jedus back ta Pilate.
Now Pilate an Herod dem done beena fight each oda, bot dat same day, dey come fa be fren.
Pilate sen fa de leada dem ob de Jew priest dem, an e call fa de tority dem wa da rule, an fa de people. E call um all fa come togeda.
E tell um say, “Oona done bring dis man yah ta me, tell me dat e da stir op de people, pit wod een dey yea. Bot wen A quizzit um fo oona, A see dat e ain done none ob dem ting wa oona say e done.
An Herod ain see nottin bad wa Jedus done needa, so e sen um back ta we yah. Oona kin see dat Jedus ain done nottin fa mek me hab dem kill um.
Cause ob dat, A gwine jes hab dem whip um an den leh um go.” [
Cause ebry yeah wen dey hab de Passoba feas, Pilate haffa free one man wa de Jew people wahn.]
Bot wen Pilate say e wahn fa free Jedus fa um, all de people holla say, “No. Kill dis man an free Barabbas fa we!”
(Barabbas de man wa dey been pit een de jailhouse cause e been a leada wen de people been riot een de city an one poson been git kill.)
Pilate been wahn fa free Jedus, so e taak ta de people gin.
Bot de people holla, tell Pilate say, “Nail um ta de cross! Nail um ta de cross!”
Pilate tell de people gin. Dat mek shree time. E aks um say, “Wa fa? A ain see nottin dat e done fa mek me hab dem kill um! Cause ob dat, A gwine hab dem whip um an den leh um go.”
Bot de people beena holla mo an mo, say Pilate oughta hab e sodja dem kill Jedus pon de cross. An cause de people holla sommuch an cause ob de leada dem ob de priest dem, e change e mind.
So Pilate done wa de people been wahn um fa do.
E free Barabbas, de man dey aks fa, wa been een de jailhouse fa de riot an fa kill somebody. Den Pilate tell e sodja dem fa tek Jedus an do wa de people been wahn um fa do.
De Roman sodja dem tek Jedus an gone. Wiles dey beena gwine, dey meet one man name Simon, wa been bon een Cyrene. E beena come fom out een de country, da gwine ta Jerusalem. De sodja dem grab hole ta um an pit Jedus cross pon um. Dey mek um folla Jedus, da tote de cross.
A whole heapa people beena folla Jedus. Some dem ooman wa beena folla um beena weep an wail fa um.
Jedus ton roun ta dem an say, “Oona daughta ob Jerusalem, mus dohn cry fa me! Mus cry fa oonasef an fa oona chullun.
Cause de time gwine come wen people gwine say, ‘Bless fa true dem ooman wa ain neba hab no chullun, dem wa ain neba bon no baby an wa ain neba nuss none!’
Een dat time, people gwine tell de mountain say, ‘Faddown pon we!’ An dey gwine tell de hill say, ‘Kiba we op!’
Cause ef dey da do dis ting ta de green wood, fa sho dey gwine do wossa ting ta de dry wood, ainty?”
Wen de sodja dem tek Jedus an go fa kill um, dey tek two oda bad man fa kill wid Jedus too.
Wen dey git ta de place dey call “De place wa look like a man head,” de sodja dem nail Jedus ta e cross. An dey nail de two bad man too, each pon e own cross. Dey pit one man pon de right han side ob Jedus an de oda man pon e lef han side.
Jedus say, “Fada, paadon dem, cause dey ain ondastan wa dey da do.” An de sodja dem shrow dice fa wide op Jedus cloes mongst um.
De people beena stanop dey da look, an de Jew leada dem been dey, da hole Jedus cheap. Dey say, “E sabe oda people. So den, leh um sabe esef, ef e de Messiah wa God done pick fa true!”
De sodja dem hole Jedus cheap too. Dey come op ta um an try fa gim wine winega fa drink.
Dey tell um say, “Ef ya de king ob de Jew people, sabe yasef!”
Dey write de chaage ginst Jedus fa de people fa read, an dey nail um oba Jedus head. De chaage say, DIS MAN YAH DE KING OB DE JEW PEOPLE.
One dem two bad man wa beena hang dey pon e cross, e shrow slam at Jedus. E say, “Ya de Messiah, ainty? Well den, sabe yasef an sabe we too!”
Bot de oda bad man wa beena hang dey, e buke dat man say, “Ya ain scaid ob God? Dey done condemn ya fa dead jes like dis man yah.
Dey condemn we fa wa we done, an we da git we pay fa all de bad ting dem we done. Bot dis man yah ain done nottin bad.”
Den e beg Jedus say, “Jedus, please do, memba me wen ya come fa be King!”
Jedus ansa um say, “A da tell ya fa true, taday ya gwine be wid me een heaben.”
E been bout tweb o’clock wen all dat lan ton pitch daak til shree o’clock.
De sun stop fa shine, an de big tick curtain wa beena hang eenside God House split down de middle.
Jedus holla say, “Fada, A gii oba me sperit ta ya fa tek cyah ob me!” Wen e done say dat, e dead.
Wen de offisa fa de sodja dem see wa happen, e praise God. E say, “Fa true, dis man yah ain done nottin bad.”
All de people wa beena geda dey fa look, wen dey see wa happen, dey lef an gone home. Wiles dey beena gwine, dey beat pon dey chest.
An all de people wa been know Jedus, an de ooman dem wa come wid um outta Galilee, beena stanop way off fom de cross, da look pon all wa happen.
One man been dey name Joseph, a memba ob de Jew Council. E been a good man an e beena waak scraight.
E ain been gree wid de Council wen dey cide fa condemn Jedus an han um oba ta de Roman tority dem. Joseph come fom de town name Arimathea een Judea. E beena wait fa de time wen God gwine rule oba dis wol.
Joseph gone ta Pilate an aks um fa leh um hab Jedus body, an Pilate leh um hab um.
So den, Joseph tek Jedus body down fom de cross an wrop um op een a linen closs. E pit um eenside a tomb wa done been cut outta a big rock. Nobody ain neba been pit een dat tomb fo dat.
An dat day been de Preparation Day, wen dey git ready fa de Jew Woshup Day. An de Woshup Day been jes bout fa staat.
De ooman dem dat been come outta Galilee wid Jedus, dey folla Joseph an see de tomb an how Joseph pit Jedus body een um.
Den dey lef an gone home an git spice an pafume ready fa rub pon Jedus body. Wen de Woshup Day come, dey ain do no wok, jes like de Jew Law say.
Aaly een de maanin de fus day ob de week, fo day clean, de ooman dem tek de spice wa dey done been mix op an gone ta Jedus tomb.
Wen dey git ta de tomb, dey see dat de stone wa beena kiba de door ta de tomb done been roll back.
So dey gone eenside, bot dey ain find de Lawd Jedus body.
Dey beena wonda bout wa done happen, wen all ob a sudden dey see two man da stanop dey wa hab on bright cloes wa da shine.
De ooman dem been too scaid, an dey bow dey head down ta de groun. Bot de man dem tell um say, “Oona ain oughta look yah mongst de dead people fa a man wa da lib, ainty?
Jedus ain yah. E done git op fom mongst de dead, an e da lib gin! Oona memba wa e been tell oona wen e been dey wid oona een Galilee.
E say, ‘Dey gwine grab hole ta de Man wa Come fom God an han um oba ta wickity people wa gwine kill um pon a cross. Atta shree day e gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin.’ ”
Den de ooman dem memba all dat wa Jedus been tell um.
Dey lef de tomb an gone back ta town an tell de leben postle dem an all de oda people wa beena waak wid Jedus, bout all wa done happen.
Dem ooman been Mary Magdalene, Joanna, an Mary, James modda. Dem an de oda ooman dem wa been dey wid um tell de postle dem wa done happen.
Bot de postle dem ain bleebe dem ooman, cause wa dey say ain mek no sense ta um.
Bot Peter git op an ron ta de tomb. Wen e git dey, e bend down an e look eenside. E jes see de linen grabe cloes wa dey been nyuse fa wrop op Jedus body dey, nottin mo. Den Peter gone back home, da wonda wa been happen.
Dat same day, two man wa beena folla Jedus, dey beena gwine ta a settlement name Emmaus. Fom Jerusalem ta dat settlement been bout seben mile.
De two man beena taak bout all dem ting wa jes happen een Jerusalem.
Wiles dey beena taak, Jedus esef come nigh ta um an waak longside um.
Dey shim, bot dey ain recognize who e been.
Jedus aks dem say, “Wa oona da taak bout togeda wiles oona da waak long?” De two man stop an stan still, an dey look too sad.
One dem wa name Cleopas ansa Jedus say, “Ya mus be de onliest man wa da lib een Jerusalem an ain know wa been happen dey een dem day wa jes gone, ainty?”
Jedus aks dem say, “Wa ting?” Dey say, “Dem ting wa happen ta Jedus fom Nazareth. E been a great prophet. E hab powa fa do miracle an fa taak great ting. E hab fabor wid God an wid all de people too.
De leada dem ob de Jew priest dem an we rula dem done tek Jedus an han um oba ta de Roman Gobna Pilate fa condemn um fa dead. An de sodja dem nail um ta de cross an kill um.
We been tink dat Jedus been gwine free de Israel people! Pontop ob dat, taday mek shree day since all dat happen.
An pontop ob all dat, some we ooman dem stonish we tommuch. Dey gone ta de tomb aaly dis maanin,
bot dey ain find Jedus body dey een de tomb. Wen dey come back, de ooman dem tell we dat dey been see a wision ob angel fom God dey. De angel dem tell um dat Jedus da lib.
Den some we people dat been wid we gone ta de tomb, an dey find um jes like de ooman dem beena tell we. Bot dey ain see Jedus.”
Jedus tell um say, “Oona ain got no sense. Een oona haat oona ain wahn fa bleebe all dat de prophet dem done say!
De Messiah haffa suffa dem ting an den go ta heaben an hab e paat een God glory, ainty?”
An Jedus splain ta de two man dem. E staat wid Moses an all de prophet dem, da laan um wa dey been write bout um. Jedus laan um fom all God Book bout esef.
Wen de two man done git close ta de settlement weh dey beena gwine, Jedus mek like e been gwine on.
So de man dem beg um fa stay wid um. Dey tell um say, “Stay yah wid we, cause de day mos gone an de night da come soon.” So Jedus gone fa stay wid um.
Wen e git ta de table fa nyam wid um, Jedus tek de loaf ob bread an tank God fa um. Den e broke op de bread an gim dey piece.
Same time Jedus do dat, e been like de man dem eye been open op, an dey recognize dat Jedus esef dey wid um. Bot den Jedus jes disappeah an dey ain shim.
De two man dem say ta one noda, “Wiles e beena taak ta we, wen we beena waak long de road, dat been like a fire wa da bun een we haat, ainty? We been too glad wen e beena splain God Book ta we.”
Same time, dey git op an gone back ta Jerusalem. Dey find de leben ciple dem an some de oda people geda togeda.
Dem people tell de two man dem say, “De Lawd done git op fom mongst de dead an e da lib gin fa true! E done appeah ta Simon!”
Den de two man dem tell de people wa happen ta dem wiles dey beena waak long de road ta Emmaus. Dey tell um how dey been recognize dat e been de Lawd Jedus dey wid um wen e broke op de bread fa um.
Dat same time dey, wen dey beena taak bout dat, Jedus esef stanop mongst um dey. E tell um say, “Hab peace een oona haat!”
Dey been scaid mos ta det. Dey tink dey beena see a haant.
Jedus tell um say, “Oona ain oughta be scaid. Oona ain oughta wonda wa oona da see.
Look pon me han an me foot. See, A mesef fa true! Oona mus tetch me an look pon me good fashion. Den oona gwine know dat A ain no haant. A haant ain hab no body needa no bone like oona see dat A hab.”
Wen Jedus done say dat, e show um e han an e foot.
Dey beena wonda an dey still ain know wa fa tink, cause wa dey see mek um so full op wid joy. Jedus aks um say, “Oona hab sompin fa nyam yah?”
Dey gim some roas fish an some honeycomb.
E tek de fish an honey an nyam um dey fo dey eye.
Jedus tell um say, “Wen A been dey wid oona, A done tell oona bout dis. A tell oona dat all ting wa Moses been write down een de Law bout me, an wa dem prophet write down, an all dey write down een de Psalms bout me, dey all haffa happen fa true.”
Jedus mek um able fa ondastan wa been write dey een God Book.
E tell um say, “Een God Book dey write dis down: Dey tell we dat de Messiah haffa suffa an dead. An atta shree day, e gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin.
